The Seat of Divine Foresight, Starskiff Haven, Exalting Sanctum, the Divination Commission, and the Artisanship Commission... You've made quite a few friends this trip.

submissions.target: Find Arlan and listen to the space station's star echo remnants
submissions.desc: The Legion's campaign has come to a temporary end. Traveling amongst the vast sea of stars, the star echo remnants from Herta Space Station are heard once again — with the combined strength of Asta and all the researchers, the peerless space station seems to be expanding and recruiting for an operation known as Project Revival.\nArlan believes that you are the most suitable candidate for this.

submissions.target: Head to the base zone and help the researcher in need
submissions.desc: The Base Zone on the frontline is engulfed in grave danger. The researchers are alone and waiting for support. At this moment, an acquaintance named Abraham is about to face his Achilles Heel...

submissions.target: Activate the extinguished anchor in the target cabin
submissions.desc: The Base Zone on the frontline is engulfed in grave danger. The researchers are alone and waiting for support. At this moment, an acquaintance named Abraham is about to face his Achilles Heel...

submissions.target: Let Abraham know that the anchor is operational again
submissions.desc: The Base Zone on the frontline is engulfed in grave danger. The researchers are alone and waiting for support. At this moment, an acquaintance named Abraham is about to face his Achilles Heel...

submissions.target: Make your way through the locked cabin infested with Legion abominations
submissions.desc: The Base Zone on the frontline is engulfed in grave danger. The researchers are alone and waiting for support. At this moment, an acquaintance named Abraham is about to face his Achilles Heel...

submissions.target: Ask about what Wen Mingde is troubling over
submissions.desc: Wen Mingde, the leader of the Curio Collection Squad, is troubling over a runaway Curio — the Xenohydro. He has a mission that requires the help of a junior assistant like you. He needs you to bring back the missing researcher, Abraham.

submissions.target: Find and bring back the timid researcher Abraham
submissions.desc: The monsters are roaming in the cabin, and Abraham's life is at stake. His safety is the most urgent matter at the moment. Ask him about the details after the crisis has been averted.

submissions.target: Ask about how Abraham went missing
submissions.desc: The monsters are roaming in the cabin, and Abraham's life is at stake. His safety is the most urgent matter at the moment. Ask him about the details after the crisis has been averted.

submissions.target: Step forward and identify the real Wen Mingde
submissions.desc: This is a great play where identifying the real Wen Mingde is the main focal point. You were the one that has been cooperating with Wen Mingde and now you've become the key to solving this mystery.

submissions.target: Find out about countermeasures to deal with the Xenohydro's escape
submissions.desc: The Xenohydro escapes once again after the entire ruckus.\nMaybe you'll run into it again somewhere unexpectedly in the future...

submissions.target: Find the source of the cry for help by following the decibel changes
submissions.desc: After stepping into the familiar Supply Zone, a cry for help could be heard from somewhere out of sight. Rescue the mysterious researcher who was trapped, and maybe he'll tell you something you don't know about the Comet Hunter.

submissions.target: Find the source of the cry for help by following the decibel changes
submissions.desc: After stepping into the familiar Supply Zone, a cry for help could be heard from somewhere out of sight. Rescue the mysterious researcher who was trapped, and maybe he'll tell you something you don't know about the Comet Hunter.

submissions.target: Operate the control device and connect the repulsion bridge to save the old man
submissions.desc: Wen Tianweng describes his past with the Comet Hunter Hosea and hands you a developed treasure map. Head to the marked location in the image to find Hosea's hidden possessions.

submissions.target: Ask about the old man's condition and investigate the stored items at the end of the repulsion bridge
submissions.desc: Wen Tianweng describes his past with the Comet Hunter Hosea and hands you a developed treasure map. Head to the marked location in the image to find Hosea's hidden possessions.

submissions.target: Go to the maintenance room! Maybe the old man will give you a reward
submissions.desc: Wen Tianweng describes his past with the Comet Hunter Hosea and hands you a developed treasure map. Head to the marked location in the image to find Hosea's hidden possessions.

submissions.target: Search for Comet Hunter's Treasure in the inner parts of the cabin
submissions.desc: Wen Tianweng describes his past with the Comet Hunter Hosea and hands you a developed treasure map. Head to the marked location in the image to find Hosea's hidden possessions.

submissions.target: Give Wen Tianweng the so-called treasure
submissions.desc: You are now in possession of the renowned Comet Hunter's Treasure and just a step away from deciphering the mysteries within. Bring the treasure to Wen Tianweng and the real prize will finally surface.

submissions.target: Go to the room marked on the developed treasure map
submissions.desc: Wen Tianweng describes his past with the Comet Hunter Hosea and hands you a developed treasure map. Head to the marked location in the image to find Hosea's hidden possessions.

submissions.target: Explore the space station to solve the three-access puzzle
submissions.desc: The Space Station Special Permit's failure, the mysterious hatch controlled by three separate access permissions, and three broken access cards found in different places...\nOnce all the puzzle pieces are put together, the mystery behind them will be revealed.

submissions.target: Open the mysterious hatch controlled by three access permissions
submissions.desc: The Space Station Special Permit's failure, the mysterious hatch controlled by three separate access permissions, and three broken access cards found in different places...\nOnce all the puzzle pieces are put together, the mystery behind them will be revealed.

submissions.target: Discuss the Letter From Locus Silentii with Asta
submissions.desc: Asta claims to have received a secret letter written by a Cryptologist From Locus Silentii, which not only revealed the whereabouts of the Xenohydro that had been missing for a long time but also tacitly implicates that someone in the space station has been covering up for the escaped Curio. The cautious lead researcher asks you to investigate.

submissions.target: Head to the storage zone to look for the Xenohydro
submissions.desc: The secret letter indicates that the Xenohydro is active in the storage zone. Investigate this zone to see if you can find any clues.

submissions.target: Comfort Lamina who has been verbally abused
submissions.desc: The Xenohydro doesn't show up, but you happen to witness Master Capote, a person of much renown in the space station, verbally abusing Lamina, the researcher from the Department of Ecology, who has been in the storage zone for a long time. Your words of comfort touch her, so she offers you help in finding the Xenohydro.

submissions.target: Follow Lamina to the Xenohydro's hiding place
submissions.desc: Lamina keeps her promise and helps you look for the Xenohydro. After arriving at its first potential hiding place, you decide to wait here... Although you know you might find nothing in the end.

submissions.target: Find a spot with a clear view of the opposite side
submissions.desc: Lamina keeps her promise and helps you look for the Xenohydro. After arriving at its first potential hiding place, you decide to wait here... Although you know you might find nothing in the end.

submissions.target: Investigate the traces of the Xenohydro's past activities
submissions.desc: Lamina keeps her promise and helps you look for the Xenohydro. After arriving at its first potential hiding place, you decide to wait here... Although you know you might find nothing in the end.

submissions.target: Discuss the potential hiding places with Lamina again
submissions.desc: You have gained nothing at the first of the suspected hiding places. Lamina keeps her promise and helps you look for the Xenohydro. Under her guidance, you step into the trap set by the Xenohydro. Thankfully, Lamina brought some healing potions with her. The surprise monster attack turns out to be a fabricated pitfall.\nAfter a series of failures, you decide to change your strategy and re-examine the Letter From Locus Silentii. You head to the place the letter points out, and you won't miss again this time.

submissions.target: Follow Lamina to the Xenohydro's hiding place
submissions.desc: You have gained nothing at the first of the suspected hiding places. Lamina keeps her promise and helps you look for the Xenohydro. Under her guidance, you step into the trap set by the Xenohydro. Thankfully, Lamina brought some healing potions with her. The surprise monster attack turns out to be a fabricated pitfall.\nAfter a series of failures, you decide to change your strategy and re-examine the Letter From Locus Silentii. You head to the place the letter points out, and you won't miss again this time.

submissions.target: Disable the Xenohydro's trap
submissions.desc: You have gained nothing at the first of the suspected hiding places. Lamina keeps her promise and helps you look for the Xenohydro. Under her guidance, you step into the trap set by the Xenohydro. Thankfully, Lamina brought some healing potions with her. The surprise monster attack turns out to be a fabricated pitfall.\nAfter a series of failures, you decide to change your strategy and re-examine the Letter From Locus Silentii. You head to the place the letter points out, and you won't miss again this time.

submissions.target: Discuss the potential hiding places with Lamina for the last time
submissions.desc: You have gained nothing at the first of the suspected hiding places. Lamina keeps her promise and helps you look for the Xenohydro. Under her guidance, you step into the trap set by the Xenohydro. Thankfully, Lamina brought some healing potions with her. The surprise monster attack turns out to be a fabricated pitfall.\nAfter a series of failures, you decide to change your strategy and re-examine the Letter From Locus Silentii. You head to the place the letter points out, and you won't miss again this time.

submissions.target: Investigate your "mirror image"
submissions.desc: The Xenohydro finally shows up, looking exactly like you.\nIt turns out, Lamina is the traitor mentioned in the secret letter.\nFrom the moment you started the investigation, she planned to lure you here and let the Xenohydro take your place.

submissions.target: Persuade Lamina to repent
submissions.desc: After thwarting the Xenohydro's plan to replace you, Lamina tells you why she conspired with it.\nNow you need to decide what to do with the two of them.

submissions.target: Tell the lead researcher about the Xenohydro conspiracy
submissions.desc: You've decided on what to do with Lamina and the Xenohydro. After telling Asta about their conspiracy, you find that the lead researcher already knows everything. More precisely, she seemingly orchestrated it all.\nBy casting you as an actor in her little play, she managed to make the lost researcher see the error of her ways.

submissions.target: Witness the scene of the fans of Master Capote having their hearts broken
submissions.desc: Through Asta's effort and with your help, Lamina understands the meaning of independence.\nMaster Capote is the only loser in this incident.

submissions.target: Listen to what the young man from the Department of Cosmic Geography has on his mind
submissions.desc: A young researcher named Rocky from the Department of Cosmic Geography seems to have a lot on his mind lately. As it turns out, he's been keeping in contact with his crush. However, this time, the expected letter of reply from his crush never came.\nThe two never run out of things to talk about, and seeing that he had just confessed his love, he is urgently asking for you to investigate why their communications have abruptly ended.

submissions.target: Find the repeater in the storage zone
submissions.desc: The station has been sending and receiving cosmic signals through an airwave repeater located in the lost territory guarded by monsters. It's been recently known as the signature cabin of the Disposal Site. With communications cut off, the most important task is naturally to ensure that the repeater is functional.

submissions.target: Collect the old parts in the crevices of the repulsion bridge
submissions.desc: The station has been sending and receiving cosmic signals through an airwave repeater located in the lost territory guarded by monsters. It's been recently known as the signature cabin of the Disposal Site. With communications cut off, the most important task is naturally to ensure that the repeater is functional.

submissions.target: Use the parts to fix the damaged repeater
submissions.desc: Now that you have the parts, it is only a matter of time before the repeater is fixed. You carefully read through the heartfelt communication records only to unexpectedly find an accident hidden in the shadows...

submissions.target: Investigate the communication history of the repeater
submissions.desc: Now that you have the parts, it is only a matter of time before the repeater is fixed. You carefully read through the heartfelt communication records only to unexpectedly find an accident hidden in the shadows...

submissions.target: Go to the monitoring room to take a look at everything that took place
submissions.desc: Go to the Monitoring Room and pull up videos of the hand behind it all. You will go and question his motives once a target is confirmed.

submissions.target: Identify the mastermind according to the surveillance footage
submissions.desc: Go to the Monitoring Room and pull up videos of the hand behind it all. You will go and question his motives once a target is confirmed.

submissions.target: Tell the young man the truth or a lie
submissions.desc: So everything Bernard did was to cover up the brutal truth: That gravitational effects have caused a change in the spacetime curvature near the planet the research team was on. The two lovers are now separated into two different space-time coordinates.\nTo him, she has become a ghost that wanders in the future. And to her, he has long grown old and perished. He may have to wait an entire lifetime for them to speak to one another just once.\nIn the end, it is your choice whether to tell him the truth or not.

submissions.target: Ask Esther about the videotapes
submissions.desc: The elderly Esther authorizes you to retrieve the videotapes of wonders and secrets. But why you?\nThat's because this researcher from the Department of Insight believes that secrets choose their own witnesses.

submissions.target: Find the lost videotapes
submissions.desc: The elderly Esther authorizes you to retrieve the videotapes of wonders and secrets. But why you?\nThat's because this researcher from the Department of Insight believes that secrets choose their own witnesses.

submissions.target: Find the lost videotapes
submissions.desc: After gathering the three lost videotapes, you notice that they all seem to be records of the life of a researcher named Sheila.\nJust as you start to figure this out, a secret defense mechanism implanted in the video signal gives you a splitting headache and knocks you unconscious.

submissions.target: Follow Joanne to the medical cabin
submissions.desc: After gathering the three lost videotapes, you notice that they all seem to be records of the life of a researcher named Sheila.\nJust as you start to figure this out, a secret defense mechanism implanted in the video signal gives you a splitting headache and knocks you unconscious.

submissions.target: Investigate and find out more about this mysterious Sheila
submissions.desc: After gathering the three lost videotapes, you notice that they all seem to be records of the life of a researcher named Sheila.\nJust as you start to figure this out, a secret defense mechanism implanted in the video signal gives you a splitting headache and knocks you unconscious.

submissions.target: Head to the room from Sheila's memory
submissions.desc: You wake up in the space station's Medical Department, just as a medical researcher, Joanne, is treating another researcher. The patient claims that she is suffering from short-term memory loss. More importantly, her name is... "Sheila."\nSensing oddity, secrecy, and conspiracy, you agree to go to the room Sheila tells you about and start an investigation.

submissions.target: Find the security monitor in Sheila's memory
submissions.desc: You wake up in the space station's Medical Department, just as a medical researcher, Joanne, is treating another researcher. The patient claims that she is suffering from short-term memory loss. More importantly, her name is... "Sheila."\nSensing oddity, secrecy, and conspiracy, you agree to go to the room Sheila tells you about and start an investigation.

submissions.target: Tell Sheila about the secret you found
submissions.desc: You fulfill your promise, arriving at the room from Sheila's memories and getting Sheila's character script and a confession letter written by the researcher Gunn.\nThe script records Sheila's day-to-day thoughts, while the confession mentions a mysterious experiment. Connecting the dots between the two sends a shiver down your spine.

submissions.target: Get into the Medical Cabin to save Sheila
submissions.desc: You decide to give the character script and the confession letter to Sheila, but Gunn seals off the Medical Cabin and is now in charge of Sheila's treatment.

submissions.target: Tell Gunn how to deal with Prototype 157
submissions.desc: You break through Gunn's hindrance and confront him face to face with the documents and videotapes as evidence. Finally, he tells you the truth.\nIt turns out that Gunn and Sheila used to be a couple, but the Sheila in front of you is just an experimental android made to look like his lover in the videotapes, who actually died years ago amidst the stars.

submissions.target: Return the videotapes and go back to where you started
submissions.desc: Once you uncover the secret of Sheila and Gunn from many years ago, you return the tapes to Esther.\nShe tells you a pitiful story. You will continue your journey with it in mind.

submissions.target: Bury the secret in your heart and continue your journey
submissions.desc: Once you uncover the secret of Sheila and Gunn from many years ago, you return the tapes to Esther.\nShe tells you a pitiful story. You will continue your journey with it in mind.

submissions.target: Check the status of Prototype 157
submissions.desc: Using the unethical nature of Gunn's experiment as leverage, you persuade him to do just as you decided and dispose of Prototype 157, also known as "Sheila."\nYou get to witness the price of choice.

submissions.target: Discuss the fate of Prototype 157 with Joanne
submissions.desc: Using the unethical nature of Gunn's experiment as leverage, you persuade him to do just as you decided and dispose of Prototype 157, also known as "Sheila."\nYou get to witness the price of choice.

submissions.target: Give instructions to Sheila, who is back online
submissions.desc: You decide to give the character script and the confession letter to Sheila, but Gunn seals off the Medical Cabin and is now in charge of Sheila's treatment.

submissions.target: Chat with Security Department staff to find out more
submissions.desc: News about the Stop-Motion Shadow sends the space station wild.\nThe Security Department is investigating the incident. Perhaps you could learn something straight from the horse's mouth?

submissions.target: Chat with the researchers
submissions.desc: Security is understaffed, and their director Arlan suggests first interviewing some of the eyewitnesses.\nDuring your chat, you gradually come to realize what this Shadow actually is...

submissions.target: Follow Adler
submissions.desc: There appears to be a deeper secret behind Adler's strange behavior. You decide to tail him and see what he's getting up to.

submissions.target: Talk to Adler
submissions.desc: Adler previously said he didn't know where the Wubbaboo was, but he's actually conspiring with it right now.\nYou decide to go up and ask what exactly is going on...

submissions.target: Help the Wubbaboo to deal with the monsters
submissions.desc: A researcher was robbed blind by monsters of the Legion. The Wubbaboo asks you to help retrieve the goods.\nGetting rid of Legion remnants around the space station is the Security Department's job. You and Arlan both agree to this request.

submissions.target: Give the belongings to the Wubbaboo
submissions.desc: You manage to get all of that researcher's belongings back from the Legion monsters.\nDespite not knowing whether Wubbaboos even have hands, you return the items — as promised — back to the Wubbaboo.

submissions.target: Head to the designated spot at the storage zone
submissions.desc: It turns out that the Wubbaboo was after possessions the researcher Eikura Shuu had left behind.\nWith the Wubbaboo's approval, it tells you the location of the Wubbaboo stronghold. You and Arlan decide to go investigate.

submissions.target: Talk to Arlan to find out more
submissions.desc: When you reach the end, you and Arlan discover Wubbaboos gathered before their monument.\nArlan seems to understand what's going on. Ask him about what is happening.

submissions.target: Snap a photo of Wubbaboos and the monument
submissions.desc: A commemoration held in order to forget — Arlan asks you to help snap a photo of Wubbaboos surrounding the monument.

submissions.target: Snap a photo of the giant Wubbaboo
submissions.desc: A commemoration held in order to forget — Arlan asks you to help snap a photo of Wubbaboos surrounding the monument.

submissions.target: Snap a photo of two sad Wubbaboos
submissions.desc: A commemoration held in order to forget — Arlan asks you to help snap a photo of Wubbaboos surrounding the monument.

submissions.target: Talk to Arlan
submissions.desc: You snap all the photos as per Arlan's request.\nAs the witness to all of this, Arlan seems to have something else to say to you.

submissions.target: Go to the storage zone and learn about the revival declared by researchers
submissions.desc: The Storage Zone that once held a variety of Curios has been turned into an emergency safe zone. The chilling shadows of death still linger, and the monsters continue to roam free in the silvery cabin. An exhilarating declaration of revival will be taking place here.\nThere's no time to waste! Your efforts are the firewood that will fuel the flames of revival!

submissions.target: Repair the gap and take out the Legion abomination at the end of the path
submissions.desc: The Storage Zone that once held a variety of Curios has been turned into an emergency safe zone. The chilling shadows of death still linger, and the monsters continue to roam free in the silvery cabin. An exhilarating declaration of revival will be taking place here.\nThere's no time to waste! Your efforts are the firewood that will fuel the flames of revival!

submissions.target: Return to the safe zone and report the results to Hinkel
submissions.desc: The Storage Zone that once held a variety of Curios has been turned into an emergency safe zone. The chilling shadows of death still linger, and the monsters continue to roam free in the silvery cabin. An exhilarating declaration of revival will be taking place here.\nThere's no time to waste! Your efforts are the firewood that will fuel the flames of revival!

submissions.target: Chat with Wen Shiqi
submissions.desc: Renovations aboard the space station are proceeding everywhere at a measured pace, be it in the base zone or on the railway platform.\nSeveral researchers seem to have encountered some issues. Go and find out what happened.

submissions.target: Hand the photo to Wen Shiqi
submissions.desc: You've completed Wen Shiqi's assignment, and it's time to hand him the photos capturing all the damaged assets on the railway platform.

submissions.target: Snap a photo of the railway platform corroded by the Fragmentum
submissions.desc: Wen Shiqi in the Department of Implement Arts has been tasked by the IPC with making a damage report of all the assets in the space station.\nHe asked you to snap some photos of assets around the railway platform. Take a picture of the platform corroded by Fragmentum.

submissions.target: Snap a photo of the Astral Express
submissions.desc: Wen Shiqi in the Department of Implement Arts has been tasked by the IPC with compiling a damage report of all the assets in the space station.\nHe asked you to snap some photos of assets around the railway platform. Try taking a photo of the Astral Express.

submissions.target: Snap a photo of the broken robot
submissions.desc: Wen Shiqi in the Department of Implement Arts has been tasked by the IPC with compiling a damage report of all the assets in the space station.\nHe asked you to snap some photos of assets around the railway platform. Try taking a photo of the broken robot.

submissions.target: Ask Himeko about the rumors in the space station
submissions.desc: A mysterious person gets you into the anonymous group chat for the space station, where a rumor about Asta misappropriating public funds is gaining popularity.\nRighteous as you are, you want to step up and challenge this rumor, but where will you start your investigation?\nAs you puzzle over this, a sudden thought comes to you — why not ask the omnipotent Himeko?

submissions.target: Head to the space station and find the whereabouts of Gossipmonger
submissions.desc: Himeko recommends you to find the person making the rumor. With her help, you learn that a researcher nicknamed "Gossipmonger" may know the true identity of the one who created the rumor.\nYou decide to look for Gossipmonger at the place she frequents.

submissions.target: Ask for the whereabouts of the Gossipmonger from other researchers
submissions.desc: You waited for the Gossipmonger at her usual spot for what seemed like a long time when you realized from the researchers around that the gossip has already spread.\nYou couldn't wait for the Gossipmonger to show up, although you did manage to get her whereabouts from other researchers.

submissions.target: Speak with the Security Department member and enter the locked area
submissions.desc: You make your way toward the Special Purpose Lab, but the Security Department has already locked down the entire area. You decide to ask Security Department members about the area in which the Gossipmonger is trapped.\nDespite their repeated attempts to discourage you, you insist on entering the blocked area to rescue the Gossipmonger, Pamela.

submissions.target: Speak with Himeko and obtain her consent to take her picture
submissions.desc: Pamela's request sounds ridiculous, so you decide to directly approach the "victim." Surprisingly, Himeko doesn't seem to mind.

submissions.target: Take a picture of Himeko and send it to Pamela
submissions.desc: Himeko struck a pose for you to take her picture, and you immediately sent it to Pamela for information about the rumor spreader.

submissions.target: Find the researcher that fits Pamela's description
submissions.desc: Pamela said that the rumor maker is "a guy with black-framed glasses and side-swept bangs."\nFind the male researcher that fits the description.

submissions.target: Speak with Richard and inquire about the rumor and the encryption key
submissions.desc: The real name of Richard_Knowitall — the rumor maker in the anonymous group — is Richard. You couldn't help but laugh when you consider the fact that he used his real name in an anonymous chat group.\nRichard righteously recounts his deductions to you and insists that he is going to report Asta to Madam Herta.\nLooking through the "evidence" he presented, you conclude that this is only a farce.

submissions.target: Report to Asta
submissions.desc: After understanding the rumor about Asta's alleged embezzlement, you decide to report everything to Asta.\nWhat was surprising is not only Asta's wealth, but also the truth behind the anonymous chat group...

submissions.target: Inquire the current status of the blocked-off area with nearby staff members
submissions.desc: Learn about the current status of the blocked-off area.

submissions.target: Head to the power supply room and collect the backup batteries
submissions.desc: To restart the elevator, you need to find all of the backup batteries. Even though there are monsters roaming near the power source room, you have to go deeper into the fray...

submissions.target: Hand over the backup batteries and restart the elevator
submissions.desc: Thanks to your outstanding skills, the trip posed no real dangers as you finally collected all the backup batteries.\nIt's time to return to the elevator with the batteries and hope. The researchers are still waiting for you.

submissions.target: Take the elevator to the lower zone
submissions.desc: The Maintenance Staff took the backup batteries and successfully restarted the elevator. You step into the elevator to make your way down.\nThere's no telling whether you will be greeted by the Gossipmonger, Pamela, or unknown danger.

submissions.target: Defeat the monster and save Pamela
submissions.desc: The trapped researcher told you that Pamela went missing near where the monsters gathered.\nFinding Gossipmonger proves to be more troublesome than you thought, but at this point, saving people is more important.

submissions.target: Find out who the anonymous person is from Pamela
submissions.desc: You succeeded in defeating the monsters and saved "the Gossipmonger" Pamela.\nYou thought she might appreciate your deed, but she adhered to her professional ethics and insisted that you pay some kind of price.\nYou agreed, but surprisingly, Pamela's "price" is a picture of Himeko.

submissions.desc: Receive remote assistance from Asta and learn about the condition of the storage zone

submissions.target: Continue in-depth investigation
submissions.desc: Go to other rooms to investigate more deeply

submissions.desc: Use the camera to scan for monsters and defeat the monster that is carrying the encryption key to the room on the left

submissions.target: Collect beacon data
submissions.desc: The current zone shows signs of the Fragmentum, but the device that monitors this area was accidentally destroyed in the chaos. Asta had asked you to collect the remaining beacon data in the area.\nCollect the beacon data saved by the Wubbaboos.

submissions.desc: Defeat enemies marked by the recognition system and collect beacon data.

submissions.target: Submit beacon data
submissions.desc: You've collected enough data from the beacons. Hurry and hand them over to the investigators.

submissions.target: Learn about the current status of the blocked-off area
submissions.desc: Go to the storage zone and ask the investigators sent by Asta about the current situation.

submissions.target: Find out more details from Asta
submissions.desc: Asta seems to have encountered something worrying indeed.\nShe's waiting for you at "the old place." Head over and find out what has happened.

submissions.target: Follow Peppy
submissions.desc: Sniff sniff, sniff sniff.\nFollow Peppy!

submissions.target: Fish information out of Professor Capote
submissions.desc: Professor Capote seems to know something about the trials.\nCarefully fish out some useful information from him.

submissions.target: Talk to Capote's fans
submissions.desc: One of Capote's fans has a transcript that contains important clues.\nSeeing as you can't get any useful information out of Professor Capote, keep digging from another angle.

submissions.target: Pass on all the clues you learned to Asta
submissions.desc: You learned quite a few things from Capote's fans.\nGive everything to Asta and see if she has any more ideas.

submissions.target: Keep following Peppy
submissions.desc: Sniff sniff, sniff sniff.\nKeep following Peppy!

submissions.target: Help Dan Heng defeat the enemies
submissions.desc: Dan Heng is cleaning up the remnants of the Legion with other Security Department staff.\nGo and offer a helping hand!

submissions.target: Learn about Arlan's trial from Dan Heng
submissions.desc: The last of the Legion have been cleared out, and it's now safe to ask about Arlan's situation.\nAsk Dan Heng about Arlan's trial and his current whereabouts.

submissions.target: Pass on all the clues you learned to Asta
submissions.desc: You learned quite a few things from Dan Heng and the Security Department staff.\nGive everything to Asta and see if she has any more ideas.

submissions.target: Keep following Peppy
submissions.desc: Sniff sniff, sniff sniff.\nJust showing Peppy a photo of March 7th is enough for it to accurately locate her. Feels like it's using more than just smell to recognize people...

submissions.target: Ask March 7th, who is sitting near the railway platform, for more details
submissions.desc: According to Dan Heng, March 7th should be with Arlan.\nAsta is very worried about Arlan. Go there and ask what's going on.

submissions.target: Track down the suspicious crystals and find Arlan
submissions.desc: Based on what March 7th said, Arlan should be investigating some suspicious crystals alone.\nGo deeper amongst the suspicious crystals, and look for Arlan.

submissions.target: Defeat the mutant creatures
submissions.desc: Somehow, these turned out to be a brand-new kind of monster that not even Arlan, the big brother of the Security Department, has seen before. They are not to be taken lightly at all!\nAs for the trials... just focus on killing these monsters first!

submissions.target: Ask Arlan about the trial
submissions.desc: With the monsters finally dead, now is the time to ask Arlan about the purpose of this mysterious trial.\nDespite all the clues you've gathered, it still doesn't feel like the truth has been revealed.

submissions.target: Keep interrogating Arlan to get to the truth behind the trials
submissions.desc: Looks like Arlan doesn't plan on spilling the beans in front of everyone.\nUse the clues you've already gathered to help Asta prove her hypothesis is correct.

submissions.target: Ask Asta what she needs you for
submissions.desc: The Curio "Crackup Conch" is infected by the memetic virus, spreading anti-motivational quotes in the space station. Asta wants your help to investigate the source of this virus.\nWhich of the three suspects caused this drama?

submissions.target: Investigate Mare for unusual behavior
submissions.desc: The Curio "Crackup Conch" is infected by the memetic virus, spreading anti-motivational quotes in the space station. Asta wants your help to investigate the source of this virus.\nWhich of the three suspects caused this drama?

submissions.target: Investigate Chris for unusual behavior
submissions.desc: The Curio "Crackup Conch" is infected by the memetic virus, spreading anti-motivational quotes in the space station. Asta wants your help to investigate the source of this virus.\nWhich of the three suspects caused this drama?

submissions.target: Investigate Joanne for unusual behavior
submissions.desc: The Curio "Crackup Conch" is infected by the memetic virus, spreading anti-motivational quotes in the space station. Asta wants your help to investigate the source of this virus.\nWhich of the three suspects caused this drama?

submissions.target: Report your findings to Asta
submissions.desc: After investigating the three suspects, you make note of their unusual behavior in your mind and return to Asta. But looking back, you can't help but wonder if you can confirm who is the infected one.

submissions.target: Go to the terminal room and use the terminal
submissions.desc: Based on your findings, neither Asta nor you can tell who is infected. Asta has no choice but to grant you temporary permission to access the terminal, which stores the browsing data of everyone in the space station...

submissions.target: Ask for the maintenance engineer's help
submissions.desc: The terminal keeps reporting errors, as if it's laughing at you. Thankfully, Asta has asked a maintenance engineer to guard the terminal room. It's time to ask for his help.

submissions.target: Run the identity verification program again
submissions.desc: The engineer helps you gain access to the data in the terminal. Now you can use it.

submissions.target: Use the terminal to check Mare's data record
submissions.desc: The terminal stores the data records of everyone in the space station. You decide to begin by checking Mare's record.

submissions.target: Use the terminal to check the data records of the others
submissions.desc: You never thought Mare was someone like this. It's hard to believe that the eccentric person you know and the cute cat-lover in the record are the same. At any rate, she is not infected. Now you need to check the others...

submissions.target: Talk to the maintenance engineer and report the computing power issue
submissions.desc: You planned to finish the investigation as soon as possible after checking Mare's data record. Unfortunately, the terminal's network signal is so poor that you have to ask for the engineer's help again...

submissions.target: Talk to the maintenance engineer and start the identity verification
submissions.desc: The space station hasn't recovered from the previous accident. Without the support of new equipment, the terminal's computing power is severely lacking. The computing power should pick up the next day though. Now a new day begins...

submissions.target: Pass the optical identity verification
submissions.desc: The maintenance engineer starts the optical identity verification for you manually. So far, so good.

submissions.target: Use the terminal to check Chris' data record
submissions.desc: The terminal stores the data records of everyone in the space station. You decide to check Chris' record today.

submissions.target: Use the terminal to check the data records of the others
submissions.desc: You didn't expect Chris to cause so much trouble in online forums. No wonder he treated you like that. Now it all makes sense. But if he is not infected, who is?

submissions.target: Talk to the maintenance engineer and report the bug
submissions.desc: You planned to check Joanne's record next, but the terminal crashed again. You have to ask for the engineer's help once more...

submissions.target: Talk to the maintenance engineer and start the identity verification
submissions.desc: The terminal units are so old that they can only provide enough computing power for one check a day. You're annoyed, but the engineer promises that nothing else will go wrong today. You decide to trust him one more time.

submissions.target: Pass the optical identity verification
submissions.desc: The maintenance engineer starts the optical identity verification for you manually. So far, so good.

submissions.target: Use the terminal to check Joanne's data record
submissions.desc: The terminal stores the data records of everyone in the space station. You decide to check Joanne's record today.

submissions.target: Complete the handover with the maintenance engineer
submissions.desc: You feel relieved after identifying the infected. Now you just need to return your identity authorization to the engineer, then leave this shabby terminal room where you've wasted so much time...

submissions.target: Report the final result to Asta
submissions.desc: You're sure that Joanne is the one infected, so you report this finding to Asta. But Asta's revelation about the other two suspects is a big surprise.

mission.name: Pretty Bubbles Fly in the Sky...

submissions.target: Ask Herta about the mysterious bubbles in the Space Station
submissions.desc: You saw many strange bubbles in the space station. They gave you a notification about "no clearance" when you approached them. In that case, you can go ask the person who theoretically has the highest clearance and see what she has to say.

submissions.target: Collect all the Memory Bubbles on the space station
submissions.desc: Herta informs you that the space station's bubbles are called Memory Bubbles, and they contain precious memories that the Garden of Recollection had obtained from all over the universe (this needs to be kept confidential). Now that you have clearance, you should go and see what the memories that the Garden had collected are...

submissions.target: Go to base zone to answer the call
submissions.desc: You received Arlan's message. He seems to want to formally thank you for helping him when you first met. Get ready and go to Base Zone.

submissions.target: Go toward the elevator entrance and see who the important guest is
submissions.desc: The atmosphere in the base zone seems much more boisterous than you would expect. Hearing of the imminent arrival of an honored guest, researchers all begin their busy work. From Arlan's words, you vaguely guessed the identity of the visitor.

submissions.target: Go and wait at the elevator entrance and see who the important guest is
submissions.desc: The atmosphere in the base zone seems much more boisterous than you would expect. Hearing of the imminent arrival of an honored guest, researchers all begin their busy work. From Arlan's words, you vaguely guess the identity of the visitor.

submissions.target: Talk to the Distressed Worker
submissions.desc: The atmosphere in the base zone seems much more boisterous than you would expect. Hearing of the imminent arrival of an honored guest, researchers all begin their busy work. From Arlan's words, you vaguely guessed the identity of the visitor.\nHe is one of the other creators of the Simulated Universe, Genius Society No. 76, Screwllum.

submissions.target: Investigate the suspicious graffiti
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: Track Silver Wolf's path of infiltration
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: Continue to track Silver Wolf's infiltration pathway
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: Continue to track Silver Wolf's infiltration path
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: Head to the Curio Collection Room at the other end
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: Head to the main control room
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: Talk with Leonard
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: (Optional) Find other clues left by Silver Wolf
submissions.desc: The network security engineer of the space station thinks there is something else behind the invasion of the Legion. You recall what happened to you when you woke up and decide to join him in tracking down the Stellaron Hunter, Silver Wolf.

submissions.target: Go to Herta's Office
submissions.desc: Silver Wolf's path of infiltration eventually leads to Herta's office. After giving it some thoughts, Leonard and you decide to tell this bad news to Herta herself.

submissions.target: Talk with Screwllum
submissions.desc: Silver Wolf's path of infiltration eventually leads to Herta's office. After giving it some thoughts, Leonard and you decide to tell this bad news to Herta herself.\nHowever, the moment you entered the office, you got a surprise...

submissions.target: Enter the Simulated Universe with Screwllum's help
submissions.desc: Screwllum's visit was to terminate the Simulated Universe project, how surprising! Thankfully, the robot gentleman is an open-minded individual, and he is more than happy to provide you with whatever help you need in your investigation before shutting down the system for good.

submissions.target: (Optional) Talk to Leonard
submissions.desc: Screwllum's visit was to terminate the Simulated Universe project, how surprising! Thankfully, the robot gentleman is an open-minded individual, and he is more than happy to provide you with whatever help you need in your investigation before shutting down the system for good.

submissions.target: Enter the Simulated Universe with Screwllum's help
submissions.desc: Screwllum's visit is to terminate the Simulated Universe project. How surprising! Thankfully, the robot gentleman is an open-minded individual, and he is more than happy to provide you with whatever help you need in your investigation before shutting down the system for good.

submissions.target: Go deep into the Simulated Universe
submissions.desc: With Screwllum's help, you entered the Return Sequences of the Simulated Universe. Unsurprisingly, Silver Wolf's infiltration had reached here.\nYou have a hunch about this game hidden beneath the surface, and it will be revealed and resolved at the end of this adventure.

submissions.target: Find the Aether Cartridge's data
submissions.desc: With Screwllum's help, you entered the Return Sequences of the Simulated Universe. Unsurprisingly, Silver Wolf's infiltration had reached here.\nYou have a hunch about this game hidden beneath the surface, and it will be revealed and resolved at the end of this adventure.

submissions.target: Reach the deepest depth of the data chain
submissions.desc: With Screwllum's help, you entered the Return Sequences of the Simulated Universe. Unsurprisingly, Silver Wolf's infiltration had reached here.\nYou have a hunch about this game hidden beneath the surface, and it will be revealed and resolved at the end of this adventure.

submissions.target: Talk to Herta
submissions.desc: At this point, the incident has finally come to an end. You are not surprised by this outcome — rather, this is now more in line with your perception of the Herta Space Station.

submissions.target: Talk with Screwllum
submissions.desc: At this point, the incident has finally come to an end. You are not surprised by this outcome — rather, this is now more in line with your perception of the Herta Space Station.

submissions.target: Talk with Leonard
submissions.desc: At this point, the incident has finally come to an end. You are not surprised by this outcome — rather, this is now more in line with your perception of the Herta Space Station.

submissions.target: Clear out the last graffiti
submissions.desc: At this point, the incident has finally come to an end. You are not surprised by this outcome — rather, this is now more in line with your perception of the Herta Space Station.

submissions.target: Go to Herta's Office
submissions.desc: The troubles caused by Silver Wolf have finally abated, but Leonard still looks concerned...

submissions.target: Talk with Leonard
submissions.desc: The troubles caused by Silver Wolf have abated, but Leonard still looks concerned...

submissions.target: Complete Sealed Sector: Difficulty 1
submissions.desc: The troubles caused by Silver Wolf have abated, but Leonard still looks concerned.\nHe's asking for your help to complete a task that will improve the space station's cybersecurity and help him keep his job...

submissions.target: Complete Sealed Sector: Difficulty 2
submissions.desc: The troubles caused by Silver Wolf have abated, but Leonard still looks concerned.\nHe's asking for your help to complete a task that will improve the space station's cybersecurity and help him keep his job...

submissions.target: Complete Sealed Sector: Difficulty 3
submissions.desc: The troubles caused by Silver Wolf have abated, but Leonard still looks concerned.\nHe's asking for your help to complete a task that will improve the space station's cybersecurity and help him keep his job...

submissions.target: Complete Sealed Sector: Difficulty 4
submissions.desc: The troubles caused by Silver Wolf have abated, but Leonard still looks concerned.\nHe's asking for your help to complete a task that will improve the space station's cybersecurity and help him keep his job...

submissions.target: Talk to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom messages you: The big spring cleaning day aboard the Express is coming really soon! Pom-Pom seems really excited. Go to the Express to check it out once everything's ready.

submissions.target: Set out for the Washtopia
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom messages you: Turns out there are a whole heap of Washtopias across the universe! Once you're ready, let's go!

submissions.target: Feel out the mysterious guests
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!? And a couple of mysterious visitors seem to be approaching the cabin!\nSend out some feelers to figure out what kind of people these visitors are...

submissions.target: Comfort the Knights of Beauty's "sidekick"
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!?\nYou decide to go and encourage the IPC staff member whose attitude is wildly different from the Knight of Beauty and who looks just like another minor character... These two don't seem like they'd get along! Why are they appearing together?

submissions.target: Talk to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!? And there are mysterious visitors approaching the cabin!\nLooks like you'll have to figure out this latest Express "crisis" together...

submissions.target: Support March 7th
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!? And there are mysterious visitors approaching the cabin!\nLooks like you'll have to figure out this latest Express "crisis" together...

submissions.target: Go back to the Parlor Car and look around
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!?\nThings are starting to become trickier than you thought...

submissions.target: Take photos with the camera and find some clues
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!?\nThings are starting to become trickier than you thought...

submissions.target: Talk the clues over with Himeko
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!?\nThings are starting to become trickier than you thought...

submissions.target: Find a faster way to search
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!?\nPom-Pom has a portable train cleaning kit. Who knew it'd come in handy at a time like this...

submissions.target: Go support Argenti in the illusion
submissions.desc: A spaceship... has somehow rear-ended the Astral Express!?\nEach and every move this Knight of Beauty makes is more unpredictable than the last...

submissions.target: Talk strategy with Welt
submissions.desc: Has the Express somehow... been swallowed up by a Giant Sting!?

submissions.target: Chat alone with Argenti
submissions.desc: The long, scarlet night of hallucinations forges endlessly on.\nArgenti invites you to a "1-on-1 discussion." His behavior is truly impossible for normal people to parse...

submissions.target: Talk to Himeko and Dan Heng
submissions.desc: Has the Express somehow... been swallowed up by a Giant Sting!?

submissions.target: Comfort everyone's negative mood
submissions.desc: Has the Express somehow... been swallowed up by a Giant Sting!?

submissions.target: Tell Welt
submissions.desc: The long, scarlet night of hallucinations forges endlessly on.\nDespite blooming into the most majestic of merit awards, it's nothing more than an ode from the universe that will soon disappear back into nothingness.

submissions.target: Help Velite stop Argenti
submissions.desc: The long, scarlet night of hallucinations forges endlessly on.\nIt seems like even the minor characters harbor their own intentions. Velite, the self-proclaimed "extra," will have ideas of his own...

submissions.target: Go back to the Parlor Car
submissions.desc: Has the Express somehow... been swallowed up by a Giant Sting!?

submissions.target: Tell Asta about Ruan Mei's departure
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei has left the space station. You feel you should mention that to Asta.

submissions.target: Go to Herta's office to find out what's up
submissions.desc: Asta is not in the base zone, and Herta seems to have been attacked yet again. You decide to head back to Herta's office to find out what's up

submissions.target: Sit on the chair and start to backtrack your memories
submissions.desc: Sit on the chair and backtrack your memories. You need to find the Cognition Chasms that have escaped notice in order to clear yourself of suspicion.

submissions.target: Face Dr. Ratio's interrogation
submissions.desc: You have finished collecting the Cognition Chasms. Now, it's time to face the interrogation and defend yourself.

submissions.target: Get Arlan's assistance
submissions.desc: You have temporarily exculpated yourself by the end of the interrogation, but Dr. Ratio specifically asked for you to go with him to Arlan to ask for help.

submissions.target: Try to get some evidence out of Wen Shiling
submissions.desc: Adler's disappearance made the case even more enigmatic, but Wen Shiling seems to still remember his odd behavior before his disappearance.

submissions.target: Return to the seclusion zone and collate your findings
submissions.desc: Dr. Ratio seems to already have discovered the answer from what little evidence you have. It's time to return the seclusion zone and reconstruct the entire incident.

submissions.target: Listen to Dr. Ratio collate the findings
submissions.desc: Dr. Ratio seems to already have discovered the answer from what little evidence you have. Let's see what exactly he had discovered.

submissions.target: Screwllum seems to have something to tell
submissions.desc: Asta was swallowed up by infernal fire before your eyes. Listen to Screwllum's deductions before you act on anything.

submissions.target: Explore the related memory "Asta's troubles" through the Memory Bubble
submissions.desc: Herta had commissioned you to find a lost Curio, and you might need Asta's help.

submissions.target: Seek assistance from Asta
submissions.desc: Asta, who manages the space station, should be able to provide some clues

submissions.target: Recall the content of the conversation with Hinkel
submissions.desc: Asta doesn't seem to have any clues either. Thankfully, Hinkel from the Department of Ecology is nearby.

submissions.target: Explore the related memory "Arlan's investigation" through the Memory Bubble
submissions.desc: Hinkel recommended little Adler to you — He apparently knows the most about Curios out of the entire Department of Ecology.

submissions.target: Visit little Adler
submissions.desc: Due to Hinkel's recommendations, you decide to visit Adler. However, others seem to be looking for him too.

submissions.target: Recall the content of the conversation with Adler
submissions.desc: See what Adler has to say about Herta's commission.

submissions.target: Explore the related memory "Asta's troubles" through the Memory Bubble
submissions.desc: The memories concerning Adler seem to be rather hazy. You vaguely remember it has got to do with someone previously mentioned by Asta.

submissions.target: Recall once more the content of your conversation with Asta
submissions.desc: You seemed to have talked with Asta about something else after receiving Hinkel's recommendations. Try to remember it.

submissions.target: Find the Insight Researcher who is talking to themselves
submissions.desc: Apart from Hinkel in the Department of Insight, you also asked for clues regarding the lost Curio from someone else in that department. Who might it be?

submissions.target: Recall the content of the conversation with Emily
submissions.desc: The clues provided by Emily inspired Adler afterward. Try to remember what it might be.

submissions.target: Recall once more the content of your conversation with Arlan
submissions.desc: The incident Asta mentioned got Arlan to let down his guard. He has important findings on him.

submissions.target: Recall once more the content of your conversation with Adler
submissions.desc: Adler had a bold hypothesis thanks to Emily's information.

submissions.target: Recall once more the content of your conversation with Herta
submissions.desc: Adler's insights finally made you recall the entirety of Herta's commission. Let's double-check the content of that commission again.

submissions.target: Track the escaped infernal fire
submissions.desc: Despite catching up to the infernal fire, its ability to shuttle through space allows it to escape again.

submissions.target: Track the escaped infernal fire
submissions.desc: The infernal fire has once again escaped from before you. Its ability allowing it to warp between locations is certainly difficult to deal with

submissions.target: Track the escaped infernal fire
submissions.desc: Asta was swallowed up by infernal fire before your eyes. You must find traces of the escaped infernal fire first.

submissions.target: Try to touch the fire wall
submissions.desc: The infernal fire made bizarre walls of flame as it ran away. Passing through these walls of flame will cause deviations in your three-dimensional coordinates.

submissions.target: Track the escaped infernal fire
submissions.desc: The infernal fire's power is gradually being reduced. Seems like this is a battle of attrition.

submissions.target: Capture the escaped infernal fire
submissions.desc: The power of the infernal fire is visibly declining. This is a great chance to capture it.

mission.name: When the Stars of Ingenuity Shine

submissions.target: Talk to Herta
submissions.desc: As the Simulated Universe receives another update, the space station remains bustling with activity. This time, several prominent figures from the Genius Society have all arrived at the space station! You receive a message from Herta, who informs you that Ruan Mei has also arrived at the space station. It's time to go meet her...

submissions.target: Follow Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: The space station has been bustling with activity lately. With the latest update to the Simulated Universe and the gathering of prominent figures from the Genius Society, everyone seems to have their own agenda. You can't help but feel that there might be some unexpected events on the horizon. \nRuan Mei's demeanor strikes you as peculiar, and she appears to have something to tell you...

submissions.target: Find Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: The space station has been bustling with activity lately. With the latest update to the Simulated Universe and the gathering of prominent figures from the Genius Society, everyone seems to have their own agenda. You can't help but feel that there might be some unexpected events on the horizon. \nYou don't know Ruan Mei's exact location, so you have to look for her...

submissions.target: Get information from the researchers
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei, the master nurturer of life, asks you to recover the "little lifeforms" that are running amok on the space station. She even goes so far as to feed you an "Anti-Truth Serum" to ensure you don't reveal this matter.\nWhat could she be thinking?

submissions.target: Speak with Ruan Mei privately
submissions.desc: The space station has been bustling with activity lately. With the latest update to the Simulated Universe and the gathering of prominent figures from the Genius Society, everyone seems to have their own agenda. You can't help but feel that there might be some unexpected events on the horizon. \nRuan Mei's demeanor strikes you as peculiar, and she appears to have something to tell you...

submissions.target: Head to the storage zone
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei, the master nurturer of life, asks you to recover the "little lifeforms" that are running amok on the space station. She even goes so far as to feed you an "Anti-Truth Serum" to ensure you don't reveal this matter.\nWhat could she be thinking?

submissions.target: Check out the disturbance
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei, the master nurturer of life, asks you to recover the "little lifeforms" that are running amok on the space station. She even goes so far as to feed you an "Anti-Truth Serum" to ensure you don't reveal this matter.\nWhat could she be thinking?

submissions.target: Head underground
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. You investigate alone, and find the space filled with many incredible objects...

submissions.target: Perform a mysterious summoning ritual
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei, the master nurturer of life, asks you to recover the "little lifeforms" that are running amok on the space station. She even goes so far as to feed you an "Anti-Truth Serum" to ensure you don't reveal this matter.\nWhat could she be thinking?

submissions.target: Talk with Ruan Mei's Creation
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei's "life creations" are actually pastries with a life of their own! They have even developed their own "emotions," "thoughts," and "will"...\nNow you have to find a way to recover them.

submissions.target: Accommodate Ruan Mei's Creation
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei's "life creations" are actually pastries with a life of their own! They have even developed their own "emotions," "thoughts," and "will"...\nNow you have to find a way to recover them.

submissions.target: Speak with Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei's "life creations" are actually pastries with a life of their own! They have even developed their own "emotions," "thoughts," and "will"...\nYou've done well, but it seems Ruan Mei has new requests...

submissions.target: (Optional) Try to create life

submissions.target: Find the mysterious Little Robot
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. You investigate alone, and find the space filled with many incredible objects...

submissions.target: Continue searching for clues
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. You investigate alone, and find the space filled with many incredible objects...

submissions.target: Find the source of the noise
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. You investigate alone, and find the space filled with many incredible objects...

submissions.target: Accommodate Ruan Mei's Creation
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. You investigate alone, and find the space filled with many incredible objects...

submissions.target: Take the elevator and go to the secret zone
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. Now you need to investigate alone...

submissions.target: Investigate the secret chamber
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. You investigate alone, and find the space filled with many incredible objects...

submissions.target: Return upstairs and continue your investigation
submissions.desc: The space station has a secret zone? This might just be something not even most the researchers know about. You investigate alone, and find the space filled with many incredible objects...

submissions.target: Witness the "big trouble"
submissions.desc: A man masked by a strange plaster sculpture appears in front of you and pointed out Ruan Mei's lies. Her ambitions are far greater than they appear to be! ...\nThe thing she's cultivating... what is it, exactly?

submissions.target: Find Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: After this perplexing experience, you feel like you understand Ruan Mei less and less. She treats you with closeness but feeds you the "Anti-Truth Serum," concealing her true research purpose all along. She seems reserved, yet her ambitions are immeasurable... What kind of person is she really?

submissions.target: (Optional) Ask around for information about Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: Ruan Mei, the master nurturer of life, asks you to recover the "little lifeforms" that are running amok on the space station. She even goes so far as to feed you an "Anti-Truth Serum" to ensure you don't reveal this matter.\nWhat could she be thinking?

mission.name: When the Stars of Ingenuity Shine

submissions.target: Attend the meeting with Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: Herta, Ruan Mei, and Screwllum: a gathering of geniuses never seen across the span of history! Scenes like this don't happen every day!\nYou are curious as to what games or contests take place between such individuals...

submissions.target: Leave the Simulated Universe
submissions.desc: Herta, Ruan Mei, and Screwllum: a gathering of geniuses never seen across the span of history! Scenes like this don't happen every day!\nRuan Mei calls you aside. Looks like you won't be able to hear any more snippets of exchanges and proposals between the geniuses. You have more important things to do right now anyway.

submissions.target: Follow Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: Herta, Ruan Mei, and Screwllum: a gathering of geniuses never seen across the span of history! Scenes like this don't happen every day!\nRuan Mei calls you aside. Looks like you won't be able to hear any more snippets of exchanges and proposals between the geniuses. You have more important things to do right now anyway.

submissions.target: Speak with Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: Herta, Ruan Mei, and Screwllum: a gathering of geniuses never seen across the span of history! Scenes like this don't happen every day!\nRuan Mei calls you aside. Looks like you won't be able to hear any more snippets of exchanges and proposals between the geniuses. You have more important things to do right now anyway.

submissions.target: (Optional) Talk with Herta and Screwllum
submissions.desc: Herta, Ruan Mei, and Screwllum: a gathering of geniuses never seen across the span of history! Scenes like this don't happen every day!\nYou are curious as to what games or contests take place between such individuals...

submissions.target: Talk to March 7th
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nThere's still some time before the Express departs. Go speak with March to pass time.

submissions.target: Ask Dan Heng about his thoughts
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nMarch wants to go. Asking Dan Heng next.

submissions.target: Ask Himeko about her intentions
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nDan Heng's not going, too stubborn. Asking Himeko, but probably unlikely.

submissions.target: Return to Belobog alongside March 7th
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nLooks like it's just us. Bummer. Can't let March know, get ready and get gone.

submissions.target: Stroll through the city and take in the festive atmosphere
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nBelobog's quite lively. Taking a stroll around, might bump into familiar faces.

submissions.target: Check the condition of the miners
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nLots of miners look dazed. Need to chat with them.

submissions.target: Attempt to "communicate" with Numby
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nTrotter! Trotter! Little~ Trotter!

submissions.target: Follow Numby deeper into the Great Mines
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nThe Trotter seems to be leading the way for us. Follow it for now.

submissions.target: Confront the IPC Workers in the depths of the Great Mine
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nFound the IPC's rascals. Little Trotter was pretty useful. Time to smash.

submissions.target: Head to Qlipoth Fort and let Bronya know about the latest details
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nDidn't see Topaz. There's a new situation in Qlipoth Fort. Going back to find Bronya.

submissions.target: Compile opinions held by Overworld residents regarding Topaz
submissions.desc:
{NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:
Story leading up to this is too complicated. Basically, Bronya & Belobog = in danger.
Need to find people to get some ideas first. Starting from the Overworld.
Pom-Pom's Notes: What exactly is happening! Write down the details first, at least!

submissions.target: Compile opinions held by Underworld residents regarding Topaz
submissions.desc:
{NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:
Story leading up to this is too complicated. Basically, Bronya & Belobog = in danger.
Need to find people to get some ideas first. Finished in the Overworld. Time to go to the Underworld.
Pom-Pom's Notes: What exactly is happening! Write down the details first, at least!

submissions.target: Head to the Great Mine and ask Seele about what she thinks
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nFinished collecting ideas. It's a split vote. Oh well, let's find Seele and get her to decide.

submissions.target: Return to Qlipoth Fort and report to Bronya
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nStill a split vote. The pressure is now on Bronya. Should go back and report to her.

submissions.target: Head to Boulder Town and speak with Gepard
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nHimeko is here. Didn't sign the contract. Bronya has a plan. Must find Topaz.

submissions.target: Head to the Corridor of Fading Echoes and see where Bronya wants to take you
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nAlmost fought with Topaz. Thankfully, Bronya came to stop us. She said she'll take us to a place. Curious.

submissions.target: Follow the path to the Pillars of Creation
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nBronya took us to a new place. It's even more up north than Everwinter Hill. Wanna see what's up ahead.

submissions.target: Talk to Bronya and Topaz
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nHappy end. Everyone has a bright future. Perfection.\nPom-Pom's Notes: Never mind... I'm gonna go read Himeko's daily report...

submissions.target: Head to Goethe Hotel for a good night's sleep
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nHappy end. Everyone has a bright future. Perfection.\nPom-Pom's Notes: Never mind... I'm gonna go read Himeko's daily report...

submissions.target: Agreeing with the IPC's proposal: {MCV#2010203_0}
submissions.desc: N/A

submissions.target: Disagreeing with the IPC's proposal: {MCV#2010203_1}
submissions.desc: N/A

submissions.target: Find and confront Topaz
submissions.desc:
{NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:
Found a weird place, never been here before. Topaz is here.
Need to stop her no matter what she is planning.
Pom-Pom's Notes: What kinda place is "weird place"? At least describe it!

submissions.target: Follow along the town's roads to find Topaz
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nHimeko is here. Didn't sign the contract. Bronya has a plan. Must find Topaz.

submissions.target: Use the Automaton Stealth Bomb and clear the obstruction
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nCan't go head to head with the IPC's peons. Gepard has a plan. Time to activate the Automaton Stealth Bomb.

submissions.target: Continue following along the town's roads to find Topaz
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nHimeko is here. Didn't sign the contract. Bronya has a plan. Must find Topaz.

submissions.target: Follow along the town's roads and head to Topaz's location
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nHimeko is here. Didn't sign the contract. Bronya has a plan. Must find Topaz.

submissions.target: Look for Topaz
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nWe're in trouble. Belobog owes a whole lot of money to the IPC. Need to negotiate with Topaz in the museum.

submissions.target: Attempt a dialogue with Topaz
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nFound Topaz. Negotiations are starting. Hopefully we don't say the wrong things.

submissions.target: Negotiations failed. Summarize the situation to March 7th
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nNegotiations failed. Shoot. Next step: Is there a next step?

submissions.target: Head to Qlipoth Fort and speak with Bronya
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nUsing my reputation to get an audience with Bronya.

submissions.target: Talk to March 7th and discuss your strategies
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nBronya is in trouble. Didn't really get this thing called "debt collection." Discussing solutions with March.

submissions.target: Head to the Boulder Town and aid Seele
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nSeele sent a message. The IPC launched a sneak attack on the Underworld. Need to go see what's happening.

submissions.target: Confront the IPC Workers stationed at the entrance of the Great Mine
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nThe IPC took over the Great Mine. No manners. Needs a beating.

submissions.target: Speak with Seele and head to the Great Mine
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nHeading down in the mines to save people.\nPom-Pom's Notes: {NICKNAME} is not putting their heart into the report at all! Write it properly!

submissions.target: Look for Topaz
submissions.desc: {NICKNAME}'s Trailblaze Daily Report:\nWe're in trouble. Belobog owes a whole lot of money to the IPC. Need to negotiate with Topaz in the museum.

submissions.target: (Optional) Chat with March 7th
submissions.desc: N/A

submissions.target: Trailblaze an adventure
submissions.desc: Those on the Path of Trailblaze will encounter all kinds of strange people and odd anecdotes during the journey. Not only do these trivial stories fill up trailblazers' journals, but they also deepen their connections to all worlds.

submissions.target: Solve an Armory Box puzzle
submissions.desc: You find a strange little girl in the Fragmentum.\nWhat's she doing in here? You try to communicate with her, but failed to learn anything useful.\nThe girl is being haunted by a mysterious "puzzle"... Perhaps you can help her escape this dangerous place?

submissions.target: Talk to Cyrille
submissions.desc: You find a strange little girl, Cyrille, in the Fragmentum.\nShe's troubled by an Armory Box puzzle in front of her — you helped her solve it.\nTalk to Cyrille, and see if you can learn more about her past.

submissions.target: Solve an Armory Box puzzle
submissions.desc: You find a strange little girl, Cyrille, in the Fragmentum.\nYou helped her solve an Armory Box puzzle, but another weird puzzle appeared out of thin air.\nYou feel things are starting to get really weird... But a kind-hearted Trailblazer can't just leave a little girl out here all alone. Help her out again.

submissions.target: Talk to Cyrille
submissions.desc: You find a strange little girl, Cyrille, in the Fragmentum.\nYou helped her solve another Armory Box puzzle, earning heartfelt praises from her.\nTalk to her again and ask why she doesn't want to leave the Fragmentum.

submissions.target: Find Sampo in the Underworld
submissions.desc: You find a strange little girl, Cyrille, in the Fragmentum.\nYou helped her to solve two puzzles, but somehow she still doesn't want to leave the Fragmentum with you.\nIn desperation, you resort to asking a master for help...

submissions.target: Go find Cyrille back at Backwater Pass
submissions.desc: You find a strange little girl, Cyrille, in the Fragmentum.\nYou helped her to solve two puzzles, but somehow she still doesn't want to leave the Fragmentum with you.\nSampo finally agrees to help you resolve things — Go back to Backwater Pass and prove to him you're not crazy.

submissions.target: Find Antonia
submissions.desc: Looks like supervisor Antonia from Boulder Town wants to talk to you. Go ask her what it might be about.

submissions.target: Go to the Great Mine to look for the senior mine cart operator
submissions.desc: According to Supervisor Antonia's description, a senior mine cart operator is troubling over his not-too-bright apprentice over at the Great Mine. He's waiting for you, the Ace Assistant, to save him...\nYour lack of knowledge in mine carts and education is not a problem, because all of it can be substituted with the spirit of Trailblazing.\nThere's no time to waste, go to the Great Mine and find the senior mine cart operator and begin your trailblazing!

submissions.target: Pass the senior mine cart operator's test
submissions.desc: The senior mine cart operator prepared the Mine Cart Puzzle in front of you. Solve it promptly.

submissions.target: Go to the senior mine cart operator to claim your reward
submissions.desc: With your ingenuity, you quickly solved the mine cart puzzle set up by the senior mine cart operator.\nGo ask him what the reward is — there is usually a reward for this kind of task, isn't there?

submissions.target: Claim the reward for passing the test
submissions.desc: The senior mine cart operator prepared the rewards for solving the puzzle. Collect them now.

submissions.target: Talk to the senior mine cart operator and begin the next round of testing
submissions.desc: The senior mine cart operator seems to have prepared a new puzzle. Go and inquire about his preparation

submissions.target: Go to the senior mine cart operator to claim your reward
submissions.desc: With your ingenuity, you quickly solve the mine cart puzzle set up by the senior mine cart operator.\nGo ask him about the reward — there is usually a reward for this kind of task, isn't there?

submissions.target: Claim the reward for passing the test
