Since it has come to this, tell Regin the bad news.

submissions.target: Tell Regin the good news
submissions.desc: The Civilian Scientist, Regin, hopes to submit his thesis on the big universe time tunnel to the Supreme Guardian.\nHowever, Mr. Bova, the Minister of Education, tries to interrupt the submission process by demanding you to pass a quiz.\nA simple brain teaser like this wouldn't stop you. You answered the quiz without much effort. And now, it's time to bring the good news to Regin!

submissions.target: Speak with Regin at the Goethe Hotel
submissions.desc: The Civilian Scientist, Regin, is looking for help.\nHe seems to have currently taken an interest in the Belobog Ministry of Education's question bank. Maybe you can help him.

submissions.target: Help Regin test the question bank reserves of the Ministry of Education Officers
submissions.desc: The Civilian Scientist, Regin, wants you to test the Ministry of Education's question bank reserves.\nGo to the Overworld to find officials of the Belobog Ministry of Education and see if they are able to have you stumped.

submissions.target: Report your tests back to Regin
submissions.desc: The Civilian Scientist, Regin, wants you to test the Ministry of Education's question bank reserves.\nIt no longer matters if you got it right or wrong. You have already gotten the information he needs. Find him and tell him your findings.

submissions.target: Speak with Yueyuan at the Alchemy Commission
submissions.desc: After the Alchemy Commission delve reopened, people honest and crooked walked betwixt each other. As such, the Pearlkeepers alone are no longer enough to patrol the beach. They have offered invitations to brave and noble volunteers for the task at hand.\nYueyuan the Pearlkeeper hopes that you can help patrol the beach... Seriously, though, who's the one that actually protects this place?

submissions.target: Speak to Boss Du at Aurum Alley
submissions.desc: As Aurum Alley's clientele continues to grow, so too do those visiting Du's Teahouse. Boss Du is specially proud of his tea shop's signature Flaming Potent Tea, but in recent days, he keeps getting negative feedback from his customers...\nBoss Du is determined to meet the customer's tastes and develop some new teas for his business. However, before he can release these new drinks to the public, he still wants to hear your opinion...

submissions.target: Return to the Express
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom messages you, claiming that something strange has appeared on the Express. They hope you can help them catch it.\nWhat can you possibly do? It's not like you're a member of the Weird-Busters. You've got no choice but to heed the conductor's request, though.

submissions.target: Talk to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom messages you, claiming that something strange has appeared on the Express. They hope you can help them catch it.\nWhat can you possibly do? It's not like you're a member of the Weird-Busters. You've got no choice but to heed the conductor's request, though.

submissions.target: Locate the strange occurrence aboard the Express
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom messages you, claiming that something strange has appeared on the Express. They hope you can help them catch it.\nWhat can you possibly do? It's not like you're a member of the Weird-Busters. You've got no choice but to heed the conductor's request, though.

submissions.target: Investigate the strange mirror
submissions.desc: You actually did discover something weird aboard the Express — a mirror.\nWhy is everyone turning a blind eye to this mirror?

submissions.target: Clear any Memory stage of the Forgotten Hall
submissions.desc: This mirror turns out to be a memetic entity. A messenger from the Garden of Recollection had quietly boarded the Express in the hope of making some kind of deal with you. She says your memory is very precious, and that the Garden is willing to exchange precious materials for it. Doing so requires inducement of memories inside the Forgotten Hall, so that they can be extracted.\nYou've never seen such a complex system packaging as this.

submissions.target: Tell the truth to the Astral Express Crew
submissions.desc: This mirror turns out to be a memetic entity. A messenger from the Garden of Recollection had quietly boarded the Express in the hope of making some kind of deal with you. She says your memory is very precious, and that the Garden is willing to exchange precious materials for it. Doing so requires inducement of memories inside the Forgotten Hall, so that they can be extracted.\nYou've never seen such a complex system packaging as this.

submissions.target: (Optional) Ask the others about the weird mirror
submissions.desc: You actually did discover something weird aboard the Express — a mirror.\nWhy is everyone turning a blind eye to this mirror?

submissions.target: Complete Calyx (Golden): Bud of Memories 1 time
submissions.desc: Complete Calyx (Golden): Bud of Memories and claim the rewards.

submissions.desc: Complete a Cavern of Corrosion and claim the Relics

submissions.target: Complete Stagnant Shadow 1 time
submissions.desc: Confirm the existence of the Stagnant Shadow, then destroy it.

submissions.target: Complete Echo of War once
submissions.desc: Defeat the formidable foe in the Echo of War and claim the rewards.

submissions.target: View the guest book
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom has left a guest book for the Express's visitors. Go take a look at what's written on its pages.

submissions.target: Head to the suppression tower and talk with the Chess Ghost
submissions.desc: The Chess Ghost — who hasn't been quiet for long — has started looking for someone to play chess with near the suppression tower again. It seems that its significant defeat last time wasn't enough to make the lesson sink in. You can check out what new tricks it has up its sleeve.

submissions.target: Enter commands and guide the ingenium to leave the maze
submissions.desc: Unwilling to accept defeat, the Chess Ghost has prepared a new Pathfinder puzzle. It's time to make it acknowledge defeat gracefully.

submissions.target: Claim rewards
submissions.desc: You provided the optimal solution with your superior intellect.\nClaim your treasure chest reward next to the Chess Ghost.

submissions.target: Go to the Robot Settlement and complete the Trial of Equilibrium
submissions.desc: A creature calling himself the Arbitrator gave you a trial. According to its vague but convinced declaration, you will meet stronger foes but receive better rewards in the future by passing the trial. This doesn't seem to be a bad thing?

submissions.target: Go to the Corridor of Fading Echoes and complete the Trial of Equilibrium
submissions.desc: The Arbitrator's trial is here once again. You are already well aware of its content, format, pros, and cons, aren't you? Go then. For the sake of Equilibrium...

submissions.target: Return to the Express and talk to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom seems to have something to give you, go back and have a look.

submissions.target: Return to the Express and talk to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom seems to be troubled, head back and console them.

submissions.target: Find the suspicious fur
submissions.desc: According to Pom-Pom, the suspicious fur can be found in the carriage.

submissions.target: Tell Pom-Pom what you found
submissions.desc: Tell Pom-Pom about the fur that you found and solve the mystery.

submissions.target: Find Pom-Pom's button
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom lost their button. Help them find it.

submissions.target: Return the button to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: Return the button you found to Pom-Pom. Speaking of which... Why would a button fall off just like that?

submissions.target: Find something to distract Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom seems to be troubled and depressed. Find something to distract them and brighten up their day.

submissions.target: Go look outside the window
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom suggests you to take a walk near the window, maybe you'll discover something.

submissions.target: Talk to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: You take in the astral scenery, go back and talk to Pom-Pom.

submissions.target: Search for the missing Juice Recipe
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom lost their Juice Recipe. Help them find it.

submissions.target: Hand the recipe to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: You found the recipe, but the content... Just hand it over to Pom-Pom for now.

submissions.target: Measure Pom-Pom's height
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom is unable to measure their own height accurately, go help them.

submissions.target: Search for a Medical Department staff member to treat Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom woke up with a stiff neck. They ask you to go to Herta Space Station's Medical Department and inquire about a way to treat a stiff neck.

submissions.target: Return to the Express and convey the medical advice to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: A medical staff member offered some professional advice, go ahead and pass the message to Pom-Pom.

submissions.target: Give a helping hand to Pom-Pom, who is experiencing leg numbness
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom's legs are numb for an unknown reason, and they can only stand there. Go and help Pom-Pom out.

submissions.target: Chat with Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: For once, you're back in the Express, but Pom-Pom is giving you the cold shoulder... You have to find a way to grab Pom-Pom's attention.

submissions.target: Tell Pom-Pom what you saw
submissions.desc: You check the floor. The footprints incident is just a misunderstanding, so time to tell Pom-Pom that.

submissions.target: Look for the footprints on the floor
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom thought you dirtied the floor. Go check the floor and see if there are footprints all over it.

submissions.target: Talk to Pom-Pom after they finished adjusting the lights
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom is adjusting the light intensity in the Express and needs your input and opinion as a passenger.

submissions.target: Find Pom-Pom and play ball with them
submissions.desc: Pom-Pom is starting physical training, but they require your help to practice...

submissions.target: Spray water in the car
submissions.desc: The humidifier in the car is broken, Pom-Pom needs you to sprinkle water to maintain the humidity in the car.

submissions.target: Report to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: The humidifier in the car is broken, Pom-Pom needs you to sprinkle water to maintain the humidity in the car.

submissions.target: Find Asta or the maintenance engineer
submissions.desc: The conductor asked you to borrow the space station's manual labor robot from the maintenance engineer or Asta.

submissions.target: Report to Pom-Pom
submissions.desc: It was a shame, but report to Pom-Pom first!

submissions.target: Give the mung bean soda you bought to Pom-Pom.
submissions.desc: After placing yourself in Pom-Pom's shoes and giving the choices a lot of thought, you have bought the perfect drink (in your opinion) for Pom-Pom. What would Pom-Pom's reaction be when they drink it? Would Pom-pom smack their lips? You find yourself eagerly anticipating Pom-Pom's response...

mission.name: It All Started With a Man and a Dog (I)

submissions.target: Talk to Peppy
submissions.desc: Peppy's coordinates indicate that it is stuck in the current area. Not knowing what is happening, Asta asks you to meet up with Peppy.

submissions.target: Follow Peppy and keep moving
submissions.desc: Thanks to your help, Peppy is out of danger. You have decided to follow its lead and explore the area together...

submissions.target: Control Peppy to search for clues about Curios
submissions.desc: Asta has developed an incredible synchronization feature for Peppy... Now you and Peppy can venture out in a new form and continue to track down the lost Curio.

submissions.target: (Optional) Find Ruan Mei's creation that is asking for help
submissions.desc: You hear a nearby distress call. It seems that more than one Ruan Mei's creation is wandering in this section. If possible, it's better to go and help them.

mission.name: It All Started With a Man and a Dog (II)

submissions.target: Talk to and follow Peppy
submissions.desc: Peppy has found clues about the lost Curio. You decide to follow it and continue your search.

submissions.target: Search for the lost Curio and gather information about the butler
submissions.desc: The lost Curio is currently held by a creation known as "butler." Who is this butler? And where can they be found? Despite lacking any information, you might uncover new leads by locating the lost Curio...

submissions.target: (Optional) Find Ruan Mei's creation that is asking for help
submissions.desc: You hear a nearby distress call. It seems that more than one Ruan Mei's creation is wandering in this section. If possible, it's better to go and help them.

mission.name: It All Started With a Man and a Dog (III)

submissions.target: Meet up with Peppy and proceed to the suspicious room
submissions.desc: Peppy has discovered the butler. You join forces again and start investigating the suspicious area...

submissions.target: Find a way to open the door
submissions.desc: The sensor door has malfunctioned once again, trapping you inside the room. Instead of complaining about its poor quality to Asta, you should focus on finding a way to open the door with Peppy.

submissions.target: Move forward and talk to the butler.
submissions.desc: The butler awaits just ahead. A few threats may be sufficient to retrieve the Curio, but you have a lingering sense that it won't be that easy...

submissions.target: Talk to nearby creations to gather clues
submissions.desc: While all the other creations appear to be obedient to the butler, there could be dissatisfied individuals among them. Perhaps you can learn something from them...

submissions.target: Investigating the nearby terminal.
submissions.desc: The creations have occupied the room since the researchers left. The terminal is still operational, so maybe you can get some useful clues from it...

submissions.target: Talk to the butler and expose its lies to locate the lost Curio.
submissions.desc: As you suspected, the butler has lied to you and all the other creations. Now that you have gathered all the evidence, it is time to expose its lies. Undeniable evidence will make it speak the truth, right?

submissions.target: Retrieve the lost Curio
submissions.desc: The butler has revealed the location of the lost Curio. Now it is time to retrieve it...

submissions.target: Talk to the aide to understand the objective of the training
submissions.desc: Dunn invites you to a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nTalk to the aide and get a sense of the objective of this training.

submissions.target: Find a way to unlock the gate at the restricted zone blockade line
submissions.desc: Dunn invites you to a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nThe first aim is to break through the blockade line in the restricted zone, so go ahead and find a way to open the gate.

submissions.target: Pass Dunn's trial
submissions.desc: You successfully broke through the blockade line of the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone. Defeat Dunn to conclude the training.

submissions.target: Talk to the aide and complete the restricted zone training
submissions.desc: You passed the first restricted zone training.\nTalk to the aide and collect your reward.

submissions.target: Talk to the aide to understand the objective of the training
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nTalk to the aide and get a sense of the objective of this training.

submissions.target: Find a way to get past the gear bridge
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nThe objective this time is to defeat a robot called Major. Find a way to get past the gear bridge in the restricted zone and locate Major.

submissions.target: Pass Major's trial
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nThe road to get past Major is already clear. Defeat Major to conclude the training.

submissions.target: Talk to the aide and complete the restricted zone training
submissions.desc: You passed the restricted zone training once again.\nTalk to the aide and collect your reward.

submissions.target: Activate the first gear bridge control panel
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nYou find an encryption key. Use it to activate the control panel and control the gear bridge.

submissions.target: Activate the second gear bridge control panel
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nYou find an encryption key. Use it to activate the control panel and control the gear bridge.

submissions.target: Talk to Major and understand the objective of the training
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training exercise in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nTalk to the Major and get a sense of the objective of this training.

submissions.target: Defeat 40 Silvermane Guards in combat
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nThe objective this time is to defeat 40 Silvermane Guards... Good luck.

submissions.target: Defeat Gepard
submissions.desc: Once again, you join a joint training exercise in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nGepard is joining this training too. Defeat him to immediately conclude the training.

submissions.target: Talk to Major and complete the restricted zone training
submissions.desc: You passed the restricted zone training once again.\nTalk to the Major and collect your reward.

submissions.desc: The Silvermane Guard Technology Division invented a combat support device called the Snowshine Lamp.\nInstall the thermic core on the base of the lamp and activate it.

submissions.target: Speak with Guangjin
submissions.desc: The Realm-Keeping Commission received reports that anomalies resembling cloudhymn magic have been spotted in the Alchemy Commission delve, and that invisible monsters were encountered within this phenomenon.\nBased on the patterns of anomalies, Guangjin has prepared bait on the beach in hopes of uncovering the true source behind the phenomenon.

submissions.target: Head to the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone and discuss the military exercise details with Dunn
submissions.desc: Dunn sent you a message, hoping you will be the main drillmaster for the military exercise in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nWith the commanding officer's approval, you feel you should attend this exercise.

submissions.target: Talk to the aide and complete the military training exercise once
submissions.desc: Dunn sent you a message, hoping you will be the main drillmaster for the military exercise in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone.\nTalk to the aide and begin the first round of the military exercise, and complete the challenge meticulously designed by the Guards.

submissions.target: Talk with Liaison Officer William and complete the Fragmentum raid once
submissions.desc: Oleg sent you a message asking for help with the Silvermane Guards' raid against Fragmentum monsters in the Corridor of Fading Echoes.\nOleg wants you to go to the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone and look for a liaison officer named William. William will take you to the Corridor of Fading Echoes for the first counter attack operation.

mission.name: Eye of the Cosmos Part I

submissions.target: Speak with Ziqiao
submissions.desc: The Ambrosial Arbor's growth made Luofu's logistic system malfunction. Now, Heron Express is asking you to control cycranes to find a starskiff of theirs, which had an accident.\nSpeak with Ziqiao and see what she actually needs from you.

submissions.target: Defeat the Abominations of Abundance attracted by the roost
submissions.desc: The cycrane roost seems to have been deliberately altered, and is currently emitting high-frequency sound waves that attract Abominations of Abundance.\nYou need to defeat the Abominations of Abundance gathered under the roost before you can reach the cycrane.

submissions.target: Fix the broken cycrane roost
submissions.desc: The cycrane roost seems to have been deliberately altered, and is currently emitting high-frequency sound waves that attracts Abominations of Abundance.\nFix this roost so it can function normally again.

submissions.target: Control the cycrane to find the starskiff that had an accident
submissions.desc: Control the cycrane and take off. Your job is important, but you also shouldn't ignore life's beautiful moments around you.

submissions.target: Control the cycrane to find the starskiff that had an accident south of the Trove of Verdure
submissions.desc: Ziqiao's records say this starskiff was lost south of the Trove of Verdure. Go there to have a closer look.

submissions.target: Control the cycrane to find the starskiff that had an accident in the Cloudford cargo lane
submissions.desc: Ziqiao's records say this starskiff was lost in the Cloudford cargo lane. Go there to have a closer look.

submissions.target: (Optional) Control the cycrane to find the suspicious signal in the Cloudford cargo lane
submissions.desc: The cycrane seems to have detected an unknown signal near the Cloudford: Cargo Lane... Go have a look and you might just find some surprise there.

submissions.target: Report back to Ziqiao
submissions.desc: The job is done, and you did even better than some senior employees that have been working for a few centuries.\nGo back to Ziqiao quickly to receive your payment.

submissions.target: Find out more about the situation from Xikui
submissions.desc: Something big and unexpected must have happened for the Helm Master's Secretary to personally arrive at the scene.\nSpeak with Xikui to understand more about the situation.

submissions.target: Control the cycrane to find the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus hiding in Elixir Research Terrace
submissions.desc: Seems like these Disciples of Sanctus Medicus are the culprits who broke the roost.\nThese cunning foes went into hiding, but little did they know you were an expert at flying cycranes. Go find them.

submissions.target: Control the cycrane to chase down Disciples of Sanctus Medicus and push them into a dead-end
submissions.desc: These villains are scurrying everywhere, taking advantage of Alchemy Commission's layout. However, with the "eyes in the sky" offered by the cycrane, you will definitely be able to catch them.

submissions.target: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus hiding in Alchemy Commission
submissions.desc: These Disciples of Sanctus Medicus are very cunning, and we need to hit them hard!\nDo it, brave Trailblazer.

submissions.target: Report back to Xikui and Ziqiao
submissions.desc: The job is done, and you did even better than some senior employees that have been working for a few centuries.\nGo back to Xikui and Ziqiao quickly to receive your payment.

mission.name: For I Have Touched the Sky

submissions.target: Meet up with Welt at Stargazer Navalia
submissions.desc: The Sky-Faring Commission sent a message saying that there was a starskiff crash in Stargazer Navalia, and hopes you can help rescue the victim. Welt seems to be nearby. Hurry up and join him in searching for the victim.

submissions.target: Use the cycrane to search for the victim
submissions.desc: The terrain of Stargazer Navalia is complex, and searching on foot is rather difficult. Fortunately, the Sky-Faring Commission lent you a cycrane. As long as you use it to search from a high vantage point, you will be able to locate the crashed pilot.

submissions.target: Ask Yanming about Yukong's past
submissions.desc: To know more about Yukong's past, you would have to go to the Palace of Astrum sooner or later. Look around with Qingni. The past she will witness here may change her life.

submissions.target: Set out to rescue the trapped victim
submissions.desc: You find the crashed pilot. She is trapped among a group of abominations, and her situation is extremely dire. Quickly, save her!

submissions.target: Eliminate the Abominations of Abundance surrounding the trapped victim
submissions.desc: You find the crashed pilot. She is trapped among a group of abominations, and her situation is extremely dire. Quickly, save her!

submissions.target: Accompany Qingni through the streets to help clear her mind
submissions.desc: Welt and you again meet Yukong's daughter, Qingni. She had just had a big fight with her mother, and is in a very bad mood. Help her clear her mind. After all, helping people solve problems is also a goal of the Astral Express.

submissions.target: Head to the Palace of Astrum and accept Yukong's gratitude
submissions.desc: The girl you and Welt rescued seems to be Yukong's daughter. To express her gratitude, Yukong hopes that you can go to the Palace of Astrum for a cup of tea with her. When you dealt with Yukong before, the atmosphere was inevitably rather awkward. Now you finally have a chance to have a cup of tea in peace... At least that's what you and Welt hope.

submissions.target: Leave the Palace of Astrum
submissions.desc: As if being struck by some strange curse, meetings between the Astral Express crew and Yukong always seems to be tied to some kind of awkward situation. Welt and you don't want to be involved in other people's family affairs, so it's best to leave the Palace of Astrum first. Hopefully the atmosphere will be less tense the next time you meet with Yukong...

submissions.target: Head to Stargazer Navalia and search for Yukong's lost item
submissions.desc: When Yukong was rushing to rescue Qingni before, she seemed to have dropped something in Stargazer Navalia. Accompany Qingni to find it back. Since the relationship between the two of them is currently very tense, this can be the key to salvage the situation for the mother and daughter.

submissions.target: Control the cycrane to search for Yukong's missing items
submissions.desc: When Yukong was rushing to rescue Qingni before, she seemed to have dropped something in Stargazer Navalia. Accompany Qingni to find it back. Since the relationship between the two of them is currently very tense, this can be the key to salvage the situation for the mother and daughter.

submissions.target: Head to the Seat of Divine Foresight and ask Jing Yuan about Yukong's past
submissions.desc: Unwittingly, you and Welt still got tied up in Yukong's family affairs. Qingni wants to know more about her mother's past, so she wanted to ask someone who knew. After giving it some thought, it seems that General Jing Yuan is the most suitable candidate.

submissions.target: Search for the location of Yukong's personal archive in the calculation device
submissions.desc: To know more about Yukong's past, you would have to go to the Palace of Astrum sooner or later. Look around with Qingni. The past she will witness here may change her life.

submissions.target: Search for information related to Yukong's past
submissions.desc: To know more about Yukong's past, you would have to go to the Palace of Astrum sooner or later. Look around with Qingni. The past she will witness here may change her life.

submissions.target: Head to the Palace of Astrum and meet up with Qingni
submissions.desc: You learn about Yukong's past from General Jing Yuan. Perhaps she was terrified all along that her daughter would end up the same way her best friend did. In any case, bring this story to Qingni and let her make her decision.

submissions.target: Accompany Qingni to talk with Yukong
submissions.desc: Qingni already knew the stories she wanted to know, many of which Yukong wished to conceal from her. Now it's time for her to make a decision for her own life. Just as an old Stellaron Hunter friend once said to you: "When you have a chance to make a choice, make one that you know you won't regret."

submissions.target: Something seems to have happened in Stargazer Navalia...
submissions.desc: You hear an explosion from very far away, but it seems only you can hear it. It might be a delusion or some strange sixth sense... Your heart is filled with an ominous premonition.\nYou follow your instincts and head to the source of the explosion — Stargazer Navalia.

submissions.target: Meet up with Welt
submissions.desc: Qingni already knew the stories she wanted to know, many of which Yukong wished to conceal from her. Now it's time for her to make a decision for her own life. Just as an old Stellaron Hunter friend once said to you: "When you have a chance to make a choice, make one that you know you won't regret."

submissions.target: Speak with Kafka
submissions.desc: You received a message from Kafka claiming that she is in trouble and requires your help. Do you go to her rescue? ...Or rather, do you believe her?

submissions.target: Clear out the enemies roaming nearby
submissions.desc: Does "choice" really exist? From Kafka's perspective, all choices are illusions and merely represent predetermined possibilities. Free will does not exist, and your presence here is clear proof of that. Her ideas are somewhat pessimistic and nihilistic, and you can either accept or reject them.

submissions.desc: The game of truth and lies has entered its second round. What does Kafka hope to gain from this game? Perhaps just some entertainment. But from the truthful and false answers, you can finally find answers to things you've been curious about for a long time. As for which answers are true or false...

submissions.target: (Optional) Help Kafka
submissions.desc: So Blade is still aboard the Xianzhou and is still wanted. Kafka plans to use her Spirit Whisper to suppress Blade's mara-struck condition, hoping that you would protect her while she uses her ability.

submissions.target: (Optional) Ask Himeko and Welt's opinion
submissions.desc: You received a message from Kafka claiming that she is in trouble and requires your help. Do you go to her rescue? ...Or rather, do you believe her?

submissions.target: Head to the space station and find Researcher Grumpy
submissions.desc: You receive a message from a researcher named Grumpy hoping to talk with you in the Herta Space Station.\nAccording to past experiences, similar requests usually come with pretty considerable rewards... Go find her the next time you pass by the space station.

submissions.target: Attempt to clear the Stellar Flare challenge
submissions.desc: Researcher Grumpy wants your help in testing the battle simulation program called Stellar Flare.\nActivate Stellar Flare and attempt the challenges within.

submissions.target: Report the test result of Stellar Flare to Grumpy
submissions.desc: You complete the Stellar Flare testing at Grumpy's request without a hitch.\nTalk to the researcher and soothe her anxiety.

submissions.target: Go to the base zone of the space station and find the source of the strange message
submissions.desc: A strange message arrives in your inbox, containing an unfamiliar name that rouses your suspicions. Go to the space station and investigate.

submissions.target: Investigate the strange display monitor
submissions.desc: You learn the whole story of the strange message from Leonard, whose gaze drifts toward the computer in the monitoring room as he begins to explain what Cosmic Warfare is...

submissions.target: Talk with Leonard
submissions.desc: Looks like you got involved with a fantastical game. Go talk with Leonard again and listen to what he has to say.

submissions.target: Go to the base zone of the space station and chat with Leonard
submissions.desc: The Cosmic Warfare crisis has come to a stop for now. Visit the monitoring room to see Leonard.\nHopefully things have subsided for real...

submissions.target: Take a selfie with March 7th
submissions.desc: The shadowy object in the photo looks somewhat familiar. It must be something aboard the Express...

submissions.target: Ask March 7th for a situation update

submissions.target: Go to Alchemy Commission and make up stories with Mr. Xiyan
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan wants to adopt your adventure into a storytelling tale. However, due to some commercial reasons, he would like to make some... modifications to your experience.

submissions.target: Enter Mr. Xiyan's story to complete your "trial"
submissions.desc: In this made-up story, the first Cauldron Master of the Alchemy Commission designed a series of trials for their successors. Only by passing through these trials can one concoct the elixir that can make oneself be born anew.

submissions.target: Go to Central Starskiff Haven and talk to Mr. Xiyan
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan seems to be looking for you for something. Go chat with him in Central Starskiff Haven.

submissions.target: Use the collected medicinal ingredients to create the miracle pill in the elixir cauldron
submissions.desc: You completed the trial form the first Cauldron Master of the Alchemy Commission in Mr. Xiyan's story and collected all the ingredients needed to create the pills. Now is the time to craft these into the miracle pill and facilitate your transformation!

submissions.target: Break the containment mechanism in the fantasia and collect pellets
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, you need to become a cycrane to break the containment mechanism, collect pellets, and obtain the secret treasures of the first Cauldron Master of the Alchemy Commission — You feel odd about this, but Mr. Xiyan says this symbolizes you are as free as a bird.

submissions.target: Leave the fantasia
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, you need to become a cycrane to break the containment mechanism, collect pellets, and obtain the secret treasures of the first Cauldron Master of the Alchemy Commission — You feel odd about this, but Mr. Xiyan says this symbolizes you are as free as a bird.

submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, you need to become a cycrane to break the containment mechanism, collect pellets, and obtain the secret treasures of the first Cauldron Master of the Alchemy Commission — You feel odd about this, but Mr. Xiyan says this symbolizes you are as free as a bird.

submissions.target: Go to Central Starskiff Haven and talk to Mr. Xiyan
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan is a frequent offender when it comes to not finishing his stories. As a good friend of the people of the Xianzhou, you have a duty to bring your bat with you to Starskiff Haven and demand updates with justice.

submissions.target: Head to Scalegorge Waterscape and meet Mr. Xiyan
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan invites you to go to Scalegorge Waterscape together and edit your legend at the place you once fought. Alright. He can edit it to his heart's content. Just treat it as making an advertisement for the Astral Express.

submissions.target: Continue to help Mr. Xiyan complete the story
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan invites you to go to Scalegorge Waterscape together and edit your legend at the place you once fought. Alright. He can edit it to his heart's content. Just treat it as making an advertisement for the Astral Express.

submissions.target: Go to Central Starskiff Haven and talk to Mr. Xiyan
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan seems to have written some new stories based on your adventures. Go chat with him in Starskiff Haven.

submissions.target: Pay your respects to the Statue of the High Elder
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan says slowly: "There are strange fumes coming off the Statue of the High Elder, indicating that it is no simple stone. Perhaps it can guide {NICKNAME} to victory over the enemy and salvation for Scalegorge Waterscape."

submissions.target: Find the malicious Mirage Echo
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, the Statue of the High Elder in Scalegorge Waterscape comes to life, and even gives you all sort of trials to go through. Forget about the scientific realism of it all, it's pretty cool to talk with a statue.\nThe Statue of the High Elder asks you to help it get rid of a malicious Mirage Echo. Normally, Mirage Echoes can't and won't hurt people. But this is inside Mr. Xiyan's story. Anything is possible.

submissions.target: Report back to the high elder (questionable)
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, the Statue of the High Elder in Scalegorge Waterscape comes to life, and even gives you all sort of trials to go through. Forget about the scientific realism of it all, it's pretty cool to talk with a statue.\nThe Statue of the High Elder asks you to help it get rid of a malicious Mirage Echo. Normally, Mirage Echoes can't and won't hurt people. But this is inside Mr. Xiyan's story. Anything is possible.

submissions.target: Find the secret treasure left by the high elder (questionable)
submissions.desc: The Statue of the High Elder wishes you can help it find the treasure Dan Feng hid here... why is this an adventure treasure seeking story again? Never mind. As long as it makes Mr. Xiyan happy.

submissions.target: Report back to the high elder (questionable)
submissions.desc: The Statue of the High Elder wishes you can help it find the treasure Dan Feng hid here... why is this an adventure treasure seeking story again? Never mind. As long as it makes Mr. Xiyan happy.

submissions.target: Find the Vidyadhara egg containing the high elder undergoing hatching rebirth
submissions.desc: As the story progresses, the plot gets more and more outrageous. Now, the Statue of the High Elder is even asking you to... act as a midwife for the next high elder?\nYou are starting to feel this story has nothing to do with your own adventures anymore, but Mr. Xiyan thinks this is the compromise necessary for commercial success.

submissions.target: Bring the high elder into this world
submissions.desc: As the story progresses, the plot gets more and more outrageous. Now, the Statue of the High Elder is even asking you to... act as a midwife for the next high elder?\nYou are starting to feel this story has nothing to do with your own adventures anymore, but Mr. Xiyan thinks this is the compromise necessary for commercial success.

submissions.target: Go to Central Starskiff Haven and talk to Mr. Xiyan
submissions.desc: It's time to go listen to what Mr. Xiyan will make up for the next part of the story. Hopefully he'll hold himself back this time and don't write any more ridiculous twists and turns... Never mind. That's not gonna happen.

submissions.target: Head to Scalegorge Waterscape and meet Mr. Xiyan
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan invites you to meet him at Scalegorge Waterscape and says he prepared a "small surprise" for you. This sounds incredibly fishy, but he would never dare to hurt you out of all people. Just go.

submissions.target: Forge "divine weapons" with the high elder
submissions.desc: Under Mr. Xiyan's direction, you're going to be playing against this "high elder" and drawing a perfect conclusion for this legendary tale. Thankfully this old thespian seems a little more reliable than Mr. Xiyan.

submissions.target: The divine weapon is complete. It's time to head to the final battle
submissions.desc: The divine weapon has been completed, and victory is within reach. Mr. Xiyan is becoming more and more excited as he tells the story. His eyes are open wide as saucers and his voice gets louder and louder: "At this time, there is only one thought in {NICKNAME}'s head — The Lord Ravager must be destroyed so the Xianzhou can remain in peace."

submissions.target: Find the Growth Booster
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, the "high elder" takes you to many places in the Luofu to look for the various materials needed to forge the divine weapon... Now this is truly a stereotypical treasure-seeking adventure story.

submissions.target: Report back to the high elder with the Growth Booster
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, the "high elder" takes you to many places in the Luofu to look for the various materials needed to forge the divine weapon... Now this is truly a stereotypical treasure-seeking adventure story.

submissions.target: Use the starskiff seed to grow the hilt-wood from the Arbor
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, the "high elder" takes you to many places in the Luofu to look for the various materials needed to forge the divine weapon... Now this is truly a stereotypical treasure-seeking adventure story.

submissions.target: Find the treasure map from the high elder's memories
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, the "high elder" takes you to many places in the Luofu to look for the various materials needed to forge the divine weapon... Now this is truly a stereotypical treasure-seeking adventure story.

submissions.target: Find the Ignis Aureliae according to the treasure map
submissions.desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, the "high elder" takes you to many places in the Luofu to look for the various materials needed to forge the divine weapon... Now this is truly a stereotypical treasure-seeking adventure story.

submissions.target: Forge "divine weapons" with the high elder
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan loudly declares: "Now the materials have all been gathered, it is time to forge the divine weapon and completely destroy the Ruin Author's delusional plots!"

submissions.target: Forge "divine weapons" with the high elder
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan loudly declares: "Now the materials have all been gathered, it is time to forge the divine weapon and completely destroy the Ruin Author's delusional plots!"

submissions.target: Talk to Watson
submissions.desc: Watson has some special space station assignments for you. Ask her for the details.

submissions.target: Go to Exalting Sanctum and speak with Bailu
submissions.desc: Bailu, who ran away from the Alchemy Commission, seems to be in Exalting Sanctum. Greet her, and maybe then you can figure out why she is always coming to this place.\nSharp as you are, you've already discovered that she always appears at opportune moments to lead you into unknown dangers...

submissions.target: Enter Aurum Alley under Bailu's guidance
submissions.desc: Bailu has plans to show you around the food establishments at Aurum Alley over in Exalting Sanctum. It's a rare and fine thing to have someone willing to serve as a free guide!\nSince Bailu already made up her mind, you should make an effort to follow her and browse the stores in Aurum Alley...

submissions.target: Enter Aurum Alley under Bailu's guidance
submissions.desc: Bailu has plans to show you around the food establishments at Aurum Alley over in Exalting Sanctum. It's a rare and fine thing to have someone willing to serve as a free guide!\nSince Bailu already made up her mind, you should make an effort to follow her and browse the stores in Aurum Alley...

submissions.target: Speak with and buy snacks from Tall Auntie
submissions.desc: Theoretically, Luofu's night market shouldn't be so deserted. Only the food stalls have some semblance of life around them.\nBailu wants you to buy some snacks. You can take this opportunity to ask around and see what's tasty, or you can directly get some snacks from Tall Auntie.

submissions.target: (Optional) Speak with the customers and get their recommendations
submissions.desc: Theoretically, Luofu's night market shouldn't be so deserted. Only the food stalls have some semblance of life around them.\nBailu wants you to buy some snacks. You can take this opportunity to ask around and see what's tasty, or you can directly get some snacks from Tall Auntie.

submissions.target: Give the snack you bought to Bailu
submissions.desc: Theoretically, Luofu's night market shouldn't be so deserted. Only the food stalls have some semblance of life around them.\nYou got the snacks that Bailu wanted. Go bring it over to her.

submissions.target: Go to Elegance Pagoda
submissions.desc: As it turns out, filling your stomachs at the food stalls isn't what you've come here for. Bailu intends to go to Elegance Pagoda to buy some medicine jars.\nYou should keep on following your little guide.

submissions.target: Go to the docks and see what's happening
submissions.desc: As expected, you run into something unexpected. There seems to be some kind of dispute happening on the docks. Head over and see what's going on.\nFrom the sound of things, it seems like a courageous girl is taking a principled stance for something.

submissions.target: Learn about the rough details by talking to Sushang
submissions.desc: Sushang is trying to uphold justice for the people working at the docks, but instead found herself locked into a wager against the IPC representative. Has this kind girl calmed down yet?\nAsk around about what happened on the docks. If you're going to engage in gossip, might as well see it through to the end.

submissions.target: Find out about recent logistical developments at Heron Express
submissions.desc: With matters on the docks temporarily resolved, the workers also mentioned that their logistical costs can be reduced as well.\nSince you're seeing the gossip through to the end, you should continue following Mingxi the secretary and head to Heron Express.

submissions.target: Discuss the next steps with your companions
submissions.desc: Miss Secretary clearly doesn't want you to feel forced by "social pressures" to assist her, but she very much wants your help at the same time. Hence, she put forward her proposal and hopes you and your companions can talk about it.\nTalk it over with the "Victim of the Wager" Sushang and the "Steadfast Gossiper" Bailu and get their opinions.

submissions.target: Speak with Miss Secretary and inform her about your decision
submissions.desc: Miss Secretary clearly doesn't want you to feel forced by "social pressures" to assist her, but she very much wants your help at the same time. Hence, she put forward her proposal and hopes you and your companions can talk about it.\nBy the end of the discussion, both Sushang and Bailu hope that you can offer aid to Aurum Alley. You should tell Miss Secretary about your decision.

submissions.target: Find out about the merchant guild's recent happenings at Aurum Alley
submissions.desc: There should be new developments at Aurum Alley. Would you like to go back and check it out?\nVisit Aurum Alley regularly

submissions.target: Talk with Sushang at the docks
submissions.desc: You heard that Sushang has found evidence of the IPC representative damaging the docks' logistic pipeline. Head over and confirm the details for yourself.\nA real trade war isn't just made up of high-end power plays and devious strategies, but simple little dirty tricks.

submissions.target: Investigate Skott's goods
submissions.desc: An honest soul is a blameless one. If someone hasn't done anything wrong, then they have nothing to fear from an inspection.\nScrutinize Skott's goods and be vigilant for any tricks he might pull.

submissions.target: Learn how to negotiate at Oldies Depot
submissions.desc: It seems like Skott was already prepared when he started to act weird. Considering you'll need to negotiate with him down the line, he's clearly going to be a bit of a problem. Thankfully, Miss Secretary remembered that the mysterious Merchant Guild President is around. The president should be able to teach us all sorts of negotiation techniques!\nCome to think about it, it might be Lianyan operating in place of the president again. You're already pretty used to the secrecy the president seems to maintain.

submissions.target: Confirm the negotiation materials and speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: The time of negotiations is drawing near. You should go over your negotiation materials first.\nConfirm your negotiation materials with Miss Secretary and strive to claim the advantage in the upcoming clash of words.

submissions.target: Assist the merchant guild to attain their funding goal of {TEXTJOIN#63}
submissions.desc: Help the merchant guild reach the dock's revenue goal, build up cooperation between the guild and the stores, plan reasonable routes... All these tasks will help revitalize Aurum Alley.\nThe Aurum Alley Merchant Guild accumulates funding through operating the docks. You should prioritize reaching the revenue goal and help the guild overcome their immediate crisis.

submissions.target: Speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: Miss Secretary seems to have something urgent to tell you. It can't be Skott's reckoning, can it?\nThe revival of Aurum Alley is no easy task, and you're beginning to feel the full weight of the efforts demanded.

submissions.target: Head to Oldies Depot and learn about the president's viewpoint
submissions.desc: The IPC is trying to stop the revival of Aurum Alley in order to obtain the developmental rights for the area for themselves, but what does the president desire out of this situation? Perhaps only he can explain his own motive.\nHead to Oldies Depot and ask him. He's been hiding in a shop filled with second-hand goods all this time — he can't possibly be a second-hand good himself, right?

submissions.target: Speak with Yukong
submissions.desc: As the overseer of the Xianzhou Luofu's commercial activities, Madam Yukong has also arrived in this humble Aurum Alley to give you some recommendations. Say "thank you" to Madam Yukong, quickly!\nSome of the Aurum Alley merchants are displeased with the merchant guild, but as you are an outside party, you can demonstrate new possibilities that might win their confidence.

submissions.target: Speak with Mr. Xiao at Artistry Hardware
submissions.desc: Yukong told you that you need to "reassemble" the merchant guild's representatives. If you can convince Mr. Xiao, you'll win the support of many business owners.\nMr. Xiao is the owner of Artistry Hardware. Head there and speak with him.

submissions.target: Fix the broken cycrane as an apprentice
submissions.desc: Xiaohan recommended that you pose as an apprentice to get close to Mr. Xiao. Most of these craftsmen are harsh of words but soft of heart. Maybe after you wear them down, the talks will get smoother as well.\nBut this method rests entirely on the foundations of you providing free labor. You should get a cycrane fixed first. If you keep trying to repair it, the whole thing might seem a bit rude.

submissions.target: Leave Artistry Hardware and plan your next step
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiao is steadfast in his decision. Inquiring further might just lead nowhere.\nYou can leave first and make new plans after.

submissions.target: Ask Mr. Xiao for guidance as an apprentice
submissions.desc: Xiaohan recommended that you pose as an apprentice to get close to Mr. Xiao. Most of these craftsmen are harsh of words but soft of heart. Maybe after you wear them down, the talks will get smoother as well.\nYou have already done what a good apprentice is supposed to do. Next, it's time for the old teacher to speak.

submissions.target: Complete the logistics planning and speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiao is fed up with Aurum Alley's stagnancy and forced himself to believe that the IPC would provide a better future. However, now he has a new choice in the form of the "Aurum Alley Revival Project."\nMr. Xiao has agreed to establish business relations with the docks, and the merchant guild should also offer something back by including Artistry Hardware into their plans.

submissions.target: Assist the merchant guild to attain their funding goal of {TEXTJOIN#64}
submissions.desc: Help the merchant guild reach the dock's revenue goal, build up cooperation between the guild and the stores, plan reasonable routes... All these tasks will help revitalize Aurum Alley.\nThe Aurum Alley Merchant Guild accumulates funding through operating the docks. You should prioritize reaching the revenue goal and help the guild overcome their immediate crisis.

submissions.target: Find out about the merchant guild's recent happenings at Aurum Alley
submissions.desc: There should be new developments at Aurum Alley. Would you like to go back and check it out?\nVisit Aurum Alley regularly

submissions.target: Confirm the negotiation materials and speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: The time of negotiations is drawing near. You should go over your negotiation materials first.\nConfirm your negotiation materials with Miss Secretary and strive to claim the advantage in the upcoming clash of words.

submissions.target: Speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: After obtaining the president's support, the merchants who once supported him have also let go of their worries and now hope to establish partnerships with the merchant guild and the docks.\nSpices Supreme, the crowning jewel of Aurum Alley's food street, also wishes to work with the merchant guild. Go ask Miss Secretary about the details.

submissions.target: Speak with Sushang
submissions.desc: After obtaining the president's support, the merchants who once supported him have also let go of their worries and now hope to establish partnerships with the merchant guild and the docks.\nSushang is waiting for you at Spices Supreme. What a warmhearted girl. You should go meet with her as soon as you can.

submissions.target: Speak with Yancui
submissions.desc: After obtaining the president's support, the merchants who once supported him have also let go of their worries and now hope to establish partnerships with the merchant guild and the docks.\nYou can ask chef Yancui why Bailu can't eat Spices Supreme's takeout while she's at the Alchemy Commission.

submissions.target: Take a picture of Bailu at the Aurum Alley entrance
submissions.desc: The Aurum Alley Merchant Guild wishes to use Spices Supreme's renown to promote their attitudes of "revitalizing Aurum Alley." They even arranged for Bailu to serve as the "Promotional Ambassador."\nShooting promotional material is an important step of reviving the Luofu's night market.

submissions.target: Speak with Sushang and confirm the details of the promotion
submissions.desc: After shooting the visiograph, you need to discuss with Sushang about what direction the "business promotion" is supposed to take, and decide the theme for the next promo.\nYou can definitely choose to trust Sushang's business instincts, but might it be wiser and more efficient to directly ask Miss Secretary Mingxi?

submissions.target: Take a picture of Bailu and the cycranes
submissions.desc: The Aurum Alley Merchant Guild wishes to use Spices Supreme's renown to promote their attitudes of "revitalizing Aurum Alley." They even arranged for Bailu to serve as the "Promotional Ambassador."\nShooting promotional material is an important step of reviving the Luofu's night market.

submissions.target: Take a picture of Bailu and friends
submissions.desc: The Aurum Alley Merchant Guild wishes to use Spices Supreme's renown to promote their attitudes of "revitalizing Aurum Alley." They even arranged for Bailu to serve as the "Promotional Ambassador."\nShooting promotional material is an important step of reviving the Luofu's night market.

submissions.target: Speak with Yancui at Spices Supreme
submissions.desc: While you were all busy shooting promotional material, the ever-reliable secretary Mingxi already found and broached the topic of a formal partnership with chef Yancui. You should go find Miss Secretary and see how she's doing.\nHow will she use these photos? Or might she look for another photographer? It's definitely a possibility...

submissions.target: Let Bailu take a picture of you at the Aurum Alley entrance
submissions.desc: The Aurum Alley Merchant Guild wishes to use Spices Supreme's renown to promote their attitudes of "revitalizing Aurum Alley." As you have volunteered to be the "Promotional Ambassador," you must be able to bear the responsibilities of your duties.\nShooting promotional material is an important step of reviving the Luofu's night market.

submissions.target: Let Bailu take a picture of you and the cycranes
submissions.desc: The Aurum Alley Merchant Guild wishes to use Spices Supreme's renown to promote their attitudes of "revitalizing Aurum Alley." As you have volunteered to be the "Promotional Ambassador," you must be able to bear the responsibilities of your duties.\nShooting promotional material is an important step of reviving the Luofu's night market.

submissions.target: Let Bailu take a picture of you and friends
submissions.desc: The Aurum Alley Merchant Guild wishes to use Spices Supreme's renown to promote their attitudes of "revitalizing Aurum Alley." As you have volunteered to be the "Promotional Ambassador," you must be able to bear the responsibilities of your duties.\nShooting promotional material is an important step of reviving the Luofu's night market.

submissions.target: Assist the merchant guild to attain their funding goal of {TEXTJOIN#65}
submissions.desc: Help the merchant guild reach the dock's revenue goal, build up cooperation between the guild and the stores, plan reasonable routes... All these tasks will help revitalize Aurum Alley.\nThe Aurum Alley Merchant Guild accumulates funding through operating the docks. You should prioritize reaching the revenue goal and help the guild overcome their immediate crisis.

submissions.target: Find out about the merchant guild's recent happenings at Aurum Alley
submissions.desc: There should be new developments at Aurum Alley. Would you like to go back and check it out?\nVisit Aurum Alley regularly

submissions.target: Speak with the Aurumaton President
submissions.desc: You'll be bidding on behalf of the Aurum Alley Merchant Guild soon. The Aurumaton President wishes to speak with you.\nNow that you think about it, the Aurumaton President placed such an important mission in your hands because he trusts you. Listen to what he has to say.

submissions.target: Confirm the negotiation materials and speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: The time of negotiations is drawing near. You should go over your negotiation materials first.\nConfirm your negotiation materials with Miss Secretary and strive to claim the advantage in the upcoming clash of words.

submissions.target: Speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: The open bidding in the Palace of Astrum for the Commercial District has concluded. As for whether all your hard work thus far will pay dividends, that needs to wait until the Palace of Astrum makes its formal announcements.\nMingxi doesn't seem to be herself. Go ask her if anything is going on.

submissions.target: Speak with Sushang
submissions.desc: The open bidding in the Palace of Astrum for the Commercial District has concluded. As for whether all your hard work thus far will pay dividends, that needs to wait until the Palace of Astrum makes its formal announcements.\nThe ever-martial Sushang probably never expected that she would end up as a negotiator one day. Find her and speak with her.

submissions.target: Head to the Palace of Astrum and participate in the bidding
submissions.desc: Yukong has long been waiting at the Palace of Astrum.\nYou have obtained enough funding. You can now bid for the Aurum Alley area against the IPC.

submissions.target: Find out about the merchant guild's recent happenings at Aurum Alley
submissions.desc: There should be new developments at Aurum Alley. Would you like to go back and check it out?\nVisit Aurum Alley regularly

submissions.target: Talk with Mingxi at the docks
submissions.desc: Though matters have been resolved, Mingxi still has something to tell you.\nGo and meet with her again.

submissions.target: Head to the Oldies Depot and obtain the approval of the Merchant Guild President
submissions.desc: After accepting Mingxi's invitation, what's left is to formally get an official acknowledgment from the Aurum Alley Merchant Guild. To achieve this, you will serve as the "Aurum Alley Business Consultant."\nHead to Oldies Depot and speak to the president and... wait, why Oldies Depot?

submissions.target: Talk with Mingxi at the docks
submissions.desc: As of now, you are an essential aspect of Mingxi's planned "Aurum Alley Revival Project." Do what you can to restore the prosperity of Aurum Alley.\nGo talk with Mingxi and see what you can help with right now.

submissions.target: Head to the docks and assist the merchant guild to earn funds
submissions.desc: There is yet more work to do for the Aurum Alley revival project. The docks still need you.\nNo matter work, you should go operate the docks. It never hurts to make a bit more money.

submissions.target: Head to the docks and assist the merchant guild to earn funds
submissions.desc: There is yet more work to do for the Aurum Alley revival project. The docks still need you.\nNo matter work, you should go operate the docks. It never hurts to make a bit more money.

submissions.target: Speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: There should be new developments at Aurum Alley. Would you like to go back and check it out?\nVisit Aurum Alley regularly

submissions.target: Head to the Food Stall and collect the snacks Mingxi ordered
submissions.desc: Miss Secretary has officially informed you that, with your help, the Aurum Alley Merchant Guild has successfully achieved their revenue goal for this phase, and will spend part of the revenue on dock maintenance and renovations. She also ordered plenty of snacks from Tall Auntie for you to enjoy.\nThough Miss Secretary didn't state it directly, you should take this as a reward for helping everyone reach the revenue target for this phase.

submissions.target: Speak with Mingxi
submissions.desc: There should be new developments at Aurum Alley. Would you like to go back and check it out?\nVisit Aurum Alley regularly

submissions.target: Head to the Food Stall and collect the snacks Mingxi ordered
submissions.desc: Miss Secretary has officially informed you that, with your help, the Aurum Alley Merchant Guild has successfully achieved their revenue goal for this phase, and will spend part of the revenue on dock maintenance and renovations. She also ordered plenty of snacks from Tall Auntie for you to enjoy.\nThough Miss Secretary didn't state it directly, you should take this as a reward for helping everyone reach the revenue target for this phase.

submissions.target: Speak with Mingxi

submissions.target: Enter Simulated Universe: Swarm Disaster
submissions.desc: Herta, Ruan Mei, Screwllum, and Stephen have joined forces to bring about the Simulated Universe's first major update! The geniuses added a substantial influx of fun content from all their various ideas. Stephen created some Audience Dice to add a bit more spice to this test. According to him, the dice hold "powers" connected to different Paths, and is conducive to ensuring that you meet with the Aeons. Honestly, though, it's hard to tell if he's actually investigating the Aeons... or just trying to make a game.

mission.name: Swarm Disaster: Warning! Data Storage Limit Reached!

submissions.target: Speak with Herta

Herta is prepared to see this thing through to the end by your side. Hurry and save all the previous Aeon data and ensure a proper end to this test before experiencing THEIR glory once more.
