submissions.target: Talk to Herta
submissions.desc: Herta wants you to go the space station to discuss important business. This time, Herta and the three other members of the Genius Society made some... um... tiny, renovations to the Simulated Universe. You are very much looking forward to seeing what happened...

submissions.target: Enter the Planar Infinity
submissions.desc: Herta wants you to meet her at the space station to discuss something important. It seems that this time she, along with three other members of the Genius Society, made some, uh, crazy tweaks to the Simulated Universe, but they messed up a bit — all the codes got scrambled, and the universe started expanding infinitely!

submissions.target: Get information out of Cirrus
submissions.desc: Since you have already captured a heliobus criminal, you decide to get as much value out of it as possible. You will try to flip it so as to provide evidence for you.

submissions.target: Head to the Seat of Divine Foresight and ask for Jing Yuan's personal assistance
submissions.desc: Since you have already captured a heliobus criminal, you decide to get as much value out of it as possible. You will try to flip it so as to provide evidence for you.\nUnexpectedly, Cirrus takes the opportunity to present terms. It wants to duel with the general of the Luofu to consume the latter's mind.

submissions.target: Return to Fyxestroll Garden and talk to Cirrus
submissions.desc: Jing Yuan happily accepts Cirrus' proposition. The heliobus immediately draws a boundary line on the Verdant Terrace and makes a wager with you. If it emerges victorious, then Jing Yuan must fight it. However, if it fails, then it will provide you with information aiding your plan to capture all the heliobi.

submissions.target: Head to Aurum Alley
submissions.desc: After defeating Cirrus, you pose your first question to it: "How did the Healer Lady vanish in broad daylight in Aurum Alley?"

submissions.target: Talk to the medical assistant searching for Bailu
submissions.desc: Upon arriving at Aurum Alley, you inquire with the medical assistants who are here looking for Bailu, hoping to find the vanished Dragon Lady

submissions.target: Search for Bailu, who is missing
submissions.desc: Upon arriving at Aurum Alley, you inquire with the medical assistants who are here looking for Bailu, hoping to find the vanished Dragon Lady

submissions.target: Search for Bailu, who is missing
submissions.desc: After you arrive at Aurum Alley, to your surprise, you come across not one but two Dragon Ladies. Undoubtedly, this anomaly must be the work of the heliobi.

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and prepare to recover Bailu
submissions.desc: The two Bailu hastily flee, disappearing into a residence along Aurum Alley. You and the ghost-hunting squad swiftly prepare your sacred instruments, resolute in your mission to capture the dangerous heliobus that has abducted a child.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and post on Ghostly Grove about the anomaly having been resolved
submissions.desc: After successfully exorcising the heliobus in Bailu, your next task is to publicize this victory on Ghostly Grove. However, you must minimize the public's perception of how dangerous the incident was to prevent panic, while also trying to stand out online to showcase the ghost-hunting squad's triumph. The task of writing a social media post is not any less challenging than exorcising the heliobus!

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and post on Ghostly Grove about the anomaly having been resolved
submissions.desc: After successfully exorcising the heliobus in Fu Xuan, your next task is to publicize this victory on Ghostly Grove. However, you must minimize the public's perception of how dangerous the incident was to prevent panic, while also trying to stand out online to showcase the ghost-hunting squad's triumph. The task of writing a social media post is not any less challenging than exorcising the heliobus!

submissions.target: Get information out of Cirrus
submissions.desc: The entities most familiar with the temperament and habits of heliobi are none other than other heliobi also confined within the furnace. As the duel promised by the general still stands, it makes Cirrus currently the ideal source of information. Ask it about the heliobus in the Divination Commission.

submissions.target: Meet up with Qingque at the entrance of the Divination Commission
submissions.desc: Meet Qingque at the agreed location and ask her about the situation in the Divination Commission... and about what you can do to help.

submissions.target: Enter the Divination Commission and investigate the strange situation
submissions.desc: The heart of the eerie anomaly lies in the center of the Matrix of Prescience Ultima. Go with Qingque to see what has happened.

submissions.target: Ring the "Harmonic Chime" and talk to Fu Xuan
submissions.desc: Use the Ten-Lords Commission's sacred vessel "Harmonic Chime" to enter the illusion shared by Fu Xuan and the heliobus, and try to talk with Fu Xuan. The master diviner and the Matrix of Prescience both remain motionless, and everyone around her seem to be possessed. Could this be caused by the heliobus?

submissions.target: Wake Fu Xuan up using force
submissions.desc: Since the master diviner is not herself, you can always softly knock her sleeping mind awake with the baseball bat in your hand. This is also a means of exorcism.

submissions.target: Talk to Fu Xuan and try your best to wake her up
submissions.desc: Fu Xuan seems trapped in a deadlock of thoughts, attempting to prove to you that "if everything is predestined, then everything is futile." You and your squad members decide to instead use this invitation as the key to unlocking her confinement.\nKeep talking with Fu Xuan and see if you can wake her up.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Talk to Hanya about how things have been recently
submissions.desc: Madam Hanya single-handedly established the ghost-hunting squad. Report to her about the situation in the Divination Commission.

submissions.target: Head to the Alchemy Commission and locate the delirious Cloud Knight
submissions.desc: A Cloud Knight out of control... if it isn't a case of mara-struck, then it would be the work of a heliobus. Following the description in the post, you make your way to the Alchemy Commission to investigate.

submissions.target: Track down Yanqing's whereabouts
submissions.desc: A Cloud Knight out of control... if it isn't a case of mara-struck, then it would be the work of a heliobus. Following the description in the post, you make your way to the Alchemy Commission to investigate, only to accidentally run into an even more distressing piece of news. The general's retainer, Yanqing, had arrived here and crossed swords with the frenzied Cloud Knight, then left. According to the knight's testimony, a mysterious voice emanated from his own sword and spoke to him.\nHeliobi are known masters of manipulating others' minds. If they ensnare Yanqing, the consequences would be dire!

submissions.target: Follow the flying sword left behind by Yanqing
submissions.desc: A Cloud Knight out of control... if it isn't a case of mara-struck, then it would be the work of a heliobus. Following the description in the post, you make your way to the Alchemy Commission to investigate, only to accidentally run into an even more distressing piece of news. The general's retainer, Yanqing, had arrived here and crossed swords with the frenzied Cloud Knight, then left. According to the knight's testimony, a mysterious voice emanated from his own sword and spoke to him.\nHeliobi are known masters of manipulating others' minds. If they ensnare Yanqing, the consequences would be dire!

submissions.target: Follow Yanqing's flying sword to find its master
submissions.desc: Heliobi are known masters of manipulating others' minds. If they ensnare Yanqing, the consequences would be dire! You follow the trail of flying swords left behind by Yanqing, determined to contain the threat before it can get worse.

submissions.target: Seek Jing Yuan's assistance
submissions.desc: The best way to awake Yanqing from his hallucination is to involve the general. Sushang volunteers to hold off Yanqing until the general arrives. Hang in there, Sushang!

submissions.target: Accompany Jing Yuan to meet Yanqing
submissions.desc: You inform Jing Yuan about everything and request his assistance in heading to Dragonprayer Terrace and reasoning with Yanqing.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and post on Ghostly Grove about the anomaly having been resolved
submissions.desc: After successfully exorcising the heliobus in Yanqing, your next task is to publicize this victory on Ghostly Grove. However, you must minimize the public's perception of how dangerous the incident was to prevent panic, while also trying to stand out online to showcase the ghost-hunting squad's triumph. The task of writing a social media post is not any less challenging than exorcising the heliobus!

submissions.target: Get information out of Cirrus
submissions.desc: Faced with the sudden incident, Madam Hanya goes through Huohuo's potential whereabouts with your group. You discover the seemingly "docile" Cirrus may hold a vital clue about Tail and has used it as bait to ensnare Huohuo.\nWhile you are not entirely certain, confronting the cunning heliobus seems to be the best course of action.

submissions.target: Head to Cloudford and find Huohuo
submissions.desc: With surprising candor, Cirrus confesses to its deeds and reveals crucial information about Huohuo's whereabouts, even sparing you from a fight.\nAlthough this raises suspicions, the top priority remains rescuing Huohuo.

submissions.target: Enter Huohuo's hallucination with Tail
submissions.desc: The heliobus has sealed Huohuo's five senses, rendering the "Harmonic Chime" ineffective. Thankfully, Tail appears at this time. "Using a heliobus to exorcise another heliobus" sure is a new way of exorcism.\nIt is time to let Mr. Tail break into the illusion.

submissions.target: Talk to Cirrus
submissions.desc: Cirrus, having distracted the attention of everyone, gathered its power once again while the judges were absent from Fyxestroll Garden. Evidently, its plans failed once more.\nTalk to Cirrus and find out what it is planning.

submissions.target: Defeat Cirrus
submissions.desc: Cirrus, having distracted the attention of everyone, gathered its power once again while the judges were absent from Fyxestroll Garden. Evidently, its plans failed once more.\nCirrus perceives this part of its plan as a step to force Jing Yuan into a fight.

submissions.target: Talk to Hanya
submissions.desc: With General Jing Yuan's assistance, you have protected Luofu from the hidden peril that few are aware of. The ghost-hunting squad contributed quite a lot to it. Ask Madam Hanya about her thoughts on this matter.

submissions.target: (Optional) Talk to Jing Yuan
submissions.desc: With General Jing Yuan's assistance, you have protected Luofu from the hidden peril that few are aware of. The ghost-hunting squad contributed quite a lot to it. Ask Madam Hanya about her thoughts on this matter.

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and Sushang and post on Ghostly Grove about the anomaly having been resolved
submissions.desc: After successfully exorcising the heliobus in Huohuo, your next task is to publicize this victory on Ghostly Grove. However, you must minimize the public's perception of how dangerous the incident was to prevent panic, while also trying to stand out online to showcase the ghost-hunting squad's triumph. The task of writing a social media post is not any less challenging than exorcising the heliobus!

submissions.target: Talk to Hanya
submissions.desc: As of now, the "Heliobi Escape Incident Special Task Force Under the Ten-Lords Commission's Jurisdiction" has finished its duty. Go and ask Madam Hanya for her decision on the future of the ghost-hunting squad.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.\nHowever, let's not forget that the heliobus possessing Huohuo's consciousness is still inside the Lunaumbra Gourd.

submissions.target: Catch up with Bailu at all costs!
submissions.desc: You only realize that you have fallen into the heliobus' illusions when you chased it into the residence. Now, just like how Fyxestroll Garden became a shifting haze, this place has also been transformed in a never-ending labyrinth with no sense of ordinary three-dimensional space. You have no choice but to press forward.

submissions.target: Drive Lady Bailu into the matrix!
submissions.desc: You only realize that you have fallen into the heliobus' illusions when you chased it into the residence. Now, just like how Fyxestroll Garden became a shifting haze, this place has also been transformed in a never-ending labyrinth with no sense of ordinary three-dimensional space. You have no choice but to press forward.\nAfter some fruitless exertion, you finally come up with the good idea of waiting for your enemy to run into you.

submissions.target: Talk to Bailu
submissions.desc: You only realize that you have fallen into the heliobus' illusions when you chased it into the residence. Now, just like how Fyxestroll Garden became a shifting haze, this place has also been transformed in a never-ending labyrinth with no sense of ordinary three-dimensional space. You have no choice but to press forward.\nAfter some fruitless exertion, you finally come up with the good idea of waiting for your enemy to run into you.

submissions.target: Complete the Pathfinder challenge
submissions.desc: The master diviner uses "Pathfinder" to show omens to people whom destiny beckons. Despite the numerous choices they encounter, one must walk the only path in order to progress.\nShe has stubbornly holds on to her own believes, and the only thing you can do is to break her obsession by using her own rules and reasoning.\nRules are meant to be broken. It is time to overcome the Pathfinder challenges.

submissions.target: Complete the Pathfinder challenge once more
submissions.desc: The master diviner uses "Pathfinder" to show omens to people whom destiny beckons. Despite the numerous choices they encounter, one must walk the only path in order to progress.\nShe has stubbornly holds on to her own believes, and the only thing you can do is to break her obsession by using her own rules and reasoning.\nRules are meant to be broken. It is time to overcome the Pathfinder challenges.

submissions.target: Complete the Pathfinder challenge for the third time
submissions.desc: Qingque has placed "more individuals" into the sand table, determined to find an alternative solution.\nRules are meant to be broken. It is time to overcome the Pathfinder challenges.

submissions.target: Talk to Fu Xuan and try your best to wake her up
submissions.desc: Fu Xuan seems trapped in a deadlock of thoughts, attempting to prove to you that "if everything is predestined, then everything is futile." You and your squad members decide to instead use this invitation as the key to unlocking her confinement.\nKeep talking with Fu Xuan and see if you can wake her up.

submissions.target: Head to the sand table for Pathfinder
submissions.desc: Qingque says the sand table always holds an alternative solution. To find it, you must start from the sand table's exit.

submissions.target: Stand at the designated location as suggested by Qingque
submissions.desc: Qingque says the sand table always holds an alternative solution. Follow her instructions and arrive at your destined position in the sand table.

submissions.target: Talk to Yanqing
submissions.desc: Atop the Dragonprayer Terrace, where gleaming swords hang, the young Cloud Knight fixates intently upon the mirage-like sword formation and studies it with an insatiable thirst, as if intending to obtain some secret insight within. By the time you arrive, the young swordmaster has succumbed to his obsession, yearning for a duel with you.

submissions.target: Search for traces of Tail
submissions.desc: Huohuo, beguiled by the heliobus, can only searches for traces of Tail in the illusion. She is yet unaware of what she will encounter — heliobi will find the host's most painful and vulnerable emotions, and amplify them to unbearable heights.

submissions.target: Find Huohuo's mother
submissions.desc: Within the illusion, Huohuo once more experienced "the loneliness of being abandoned." Despite knowing that it is merely an illusion, she struggles to overcome it on her own.\nSurely, Mr. Tail's departure has only intensified Huohuo's feelings of being alone.\nMr. Tail must do something, such as "bring everyone back."

submissions.target: Bring Huohuo's mother back to Huohuo
submissions.desc: Within the illusion, Huohuo once more experienced "the loneliness of being abandoned." Despite knowing that it is merely an illusion, she struggles to overcome it on her own.\nSurely, Mr. Tail's departure has only intensified Huohuo's feelings of being alone.\nMr. Tail must do something, such as "bring everyone back."

submissions.target: Find Huohuo's classmate and bring them back to Huohuo
submissions.desc: Within the illusion, Huohuo once more experienced "the loneliness of being abandoned." Despite knowing that it is merely an illusion, she struggles to overcome it on her own.\nSurely, Mr. Tail's departure has only intensified Huohuo's feelings of being alone.\nMr. Tail must do something, such as "bring everyone back."

submissions.target: Defeat the heliobus that has possessed Huohuo
submissions.desc: Someone who is possessed by a heliobus cannot be possessed by another heliobus — but it is not exact true. To be more precise, Huohuo cannot be possessed by another heliobus while Mr. Tail is covering her. Go. Time to teach a lesson to the heliobus who possessed Huohuo.

submissions.target: Help Sushang escape from battle
submissions.desc: You inform Jing Yuan about everything and request his assistance in heading to Dragonprayer Terrace and reasoning with Yanqing.

submissions.target: Talk to Shouling the spiritfarer
submissions.desc: Capturing heliobi requires practice like any other skill. The spiritfarer extends an invitation to you to participate in some well-prepared heliobi training at the Suppression Tower.

submissions.target: Accept the heliobus' challenge
submissions.desc: Capturing heliobi requires practice like any other skill. The spiritfarer extends an invitation to you to participate in some well-prepared heliobi training at the Suppression Tower.

submissions.target: Head toward Stargazer Navalia
submissions.desc: The Ghostly Grove offers a myriad of uncanny stories, including an enigmatic Phantom Starskiff that eradicates the existence of living beings from the mortal world. It would be wise to follow the clues in the post and investigate in Stargazer Navalia, as it is highly possible that a heliobus is involved.

submissions.target: Talk to Qingni, who has witnessed the phantom starskiff
submissions.desc: Another girl from the Sky-Faring Commission has been attracted by the rumor and finds the Phantom Starskiff at the same time as you do.\nTalk to the foxian girl to figure out why the starskiff has emerged.

submissions.target: Head to the Palace of Astrum and talk to Yukong
submissions.desc: All clues point to Madam Yukong, Helm Master of the Sky-Faring Commission and Qingni's mother.\nThe ghost-hunting squad's experience suggests that Madam Yukong is very likely to be possessed by a heliobus.\nThe clues regarding the secret behind the phantom starskiff might lie within the Palace of Astrum.

submissions.target: Inform Qingni about your conversation with Yukong
submissions.desc: Madam Yukong has agreed to head to Fyxestroll Garden and assist the Ten-Lords Commission in their investigation. Before returning to Fyxestroll Garden, you should let Qingni know.\nHowever, Qingni is concerned that Madam Yukong has been possessed by a heliobus, and her worries are well-founded.

submissions.target: Head to Fyxestroll Garden and meet up with Yukong
submissions.desc: You meet up with Madam Yukong at Foxsomn Tomb in Fyxestroll Garden as promised, and she says, "All your doubts shall be answered." What's that supposed to mean?

submissions.target: Track down the mysterious specter
submissions.desc: Is that Qingni? Or a specter? Or was Qingni possessed by a heliobus? Oh no. You need to immediately go after her.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Search for clues about the phantom starskiff
submissions.desc: According to the post, the phantom starskiff has appeared in this area. Continue searching, and you might discover something. However, even if your search ends up fruitless, it shouldn't come as a surprise. After all, it's an exclusive phantom starskiff.

submissions.target: Catch up with the phantom starskiff
submissions.desc: The phantom starskiff has appeared. Follow it to see what is going on.

submissions.target: Discuss with the ghost-hunting squad about the post looking for help
submissions.desc: You and your fellow ghost-hunters browse Ghostly Grove, discussing which rumors and anomalies might be caused by heliobi. Accurately distinguishing them requires 99 percent common sense and one percent intuition — some call it intuition, some call it psychic powers.

submissions.target: Talk to the Chess Ghost
submissions.desc: As you arrive in the streets of Exalting Sanctum, you notice a few people who appear possessed, gathering around a plain-looking chessboard. What an old trick! How inefficient it is to put an unfinished chess game at the side of the road to rob people of their souls? What year is it? Heliobi should really take notes from IPC on how to harvest souls through capitalism.

submissions.target: Defeat the Chess Ghost heliobus
submissions.desc: You accept the challenge from the bizarre heliobus, but this is not a chess game — how can a Pathfinder challenge count as chess?\nRegardless, you manage to defeat the enigmatic heliobus.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Complete the Pathfinder challenge
submissions.desc: You accept the challenge from the bizarre heliobus, but this is not a chess game — how can a Pathfinder challenge count as chess?

submissions.target: Ask the poster for more details
submissions.desc: You and your fellow ghost-hunters browse Ghostly Grove, discussing which rumors and anomalies might be caused by heliobi. Accurately distinguishing them requires 99 percent common sense and one percent intuition — some call it intuition, some call it psychic powers.\nA post titled "My neighbor's dead wife seems to have come back" strikes an incongruous chord in your mind. You decide to meet the person who made the post.

submissions.target: Head to Aurum Alley and talk to Wenyuan
submissions.desc: You make your way to Aurum Alley with the intention of meeting the widower mentioned in the post.

submissions.target: Meet up with Huohuo
submissions.desc: How will a husband, who has been immersed in eternal mourning, react to the sudden return of his long-deceased wife? And why has this reborn "wife," whom you can't tell if she is actually human, returned from the underworld?

submissions.target: Unveil the truth to Wenyuan
submissions.desc: How will a husband, who has been immersed in eternal mourning, react to the sudden return of his long-deceased wife? And why has this reborn "wife," whom you can't tell if she is actually human, returned from the underworld?\nAfter thorough investigation, you decide to unveil the truth to Wenyuan.

submissions.target: Capture the heliobus and take it away from Wenyuan
submissions.desc: You decide to take away this heliobus metamorphed into human form.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Visit Wenyuan and check on him
submissions.desc: As you stick to the straight and narrow and strictly dole out justice as an executor of the Ten-Lords Commission's will, you feel no concern about all this. However, you still can't help but think how will the man manage after his "wife" was forcibly taken away?

submissions.target: Talk to Huohuo and post about the anomaly having been resolved
submissions.desc: Regardless, the incident has been resolved. It is time to post on Ghostly Grove, as per usual.

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and post about the anomaly having been resolved
submissions.desc: Regardless, the incident has been resolved. It is time to post on Ghostly Grove, as per usual.

submissions.target: Head to Foxsomn Tomb and meet up with Ruoxi
submissions.desc: You are not a staff of the Ten-Lords Commission, therefore you can certainly manage this incident according to the inclinations of your own heart. You let go of the "wife," hoping that they will enjoy the rest of their brief life together in happiness.\nAfter some time, the "wife" finds you again, perhaps in gratitude for your benevolence.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: At the request of the "wife," you accompany it to the suppression tower in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Discuss with the ghost-hunting squad about the post looking for help
submissions.desc: You and your fellow ghost-hunters browse Ghostly Grove, discussing which rumors and anomalies might be caused by heliobi. Accurately distinguishing them requires 99 percent common sense and one percent intuition — some call it intuition, some call it psychic powers.

submissions.target: Head to the Divination Commission and talk to Fu Xuan
submissions.desc: You arrive at the Divination Commission and meet the one who made the post asking for help, and it is none other than master diviner. She expresses her concerns about the changes occurring in Qingque. Apparently, she has been working diligently, clocking in right on time and leaving not a minute early, and meticulously planning for an (apparently) amazing business plan.

submissions.target: Listen to Qingque's business plan!
submissions.desc: What? Qingque has a plan to make everyone rich and famous with her? You're her friend, yet she hasn't even reached out to you? That doesn't seem like something a friend would do. You decide to listen to her entrepreneurial speech.

submissions.target: Talk to Huohuo and go deeper into Qingque's hallucination
submissions.desc: Qingque is freely informing everyone of her dream to make it big, getting all the diviners in the Commission distracted and eager to have a go themselves. However, you — or rather, Huohuo and Tail — have detected a trace of a heliobus' tricks. Your team ring the "Harmonic Chime" and dive deep into the illusion trapping Qingque.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Talk to the aged security guard
submissions.desc: The Realm-Keeping Commission Chancery has been transformed into a security room at the gates of a corporate building, and the Cloud Knight have become an aged security guard — Qingque's nightmare about getting rich is actually quite ambitious of her. You wonder how you should address her when you meet? General Qingque? Or President Qingque? Whatever. Seeing how long the que is, you decide to skip it.

submissions.target: Meet Qingque face to face
submissions.desc: You meet Qingque, who has been consumed by her own ambitions. She feels rather... alien to you, but regardless, she decides to offer you a chance to get rich. You certainly can't say that she didn't look after you as a friend.

submissions.target: Open ten chests
submissions.desc: You meet Qingque, who has been consumed by her own ambitions. She feels rather... alien to you, but regardless, she decides to offer you a chance to get rich. You certainly can't say that she didn't look after you as a friend.

submissions.target: Open another ten chests
submissions.desc: You meet Qingque, who has been consumed by her own ambitions. She feels rather... alien to you, but regardless, she decides to offer you a chance to get rich. You certainly can't say that she didn't look after you as a friend.

submissions.target: Head to the Alchemy Commission and find the poster
submissions.desc: A post on Ghostly Grove concerning a haunted residence catches your group's attention. After Guinaifen sent a private message to the poster, she now believes this issue is not only related to heliobi but also great content that can get more fans. You decide to go to the Alchemy Commission to meet up with the poster...

submissions.target: Speak with the poster
submissions.desc: A post on Ghostly Grove concerning a haunted residence catches your group's attention. After Guinaifen sent a private message to the poster, she now believes this issue is not only related to heliobi but also great content that can get more fans. You decide to go to the Alchemy Commission to meet up with the poster...

submissions.target: Speak with Guinaifen and prepare to enter the haunted residence
submissions.desc: The ghost-hunting squad obtained the permission to investigate the haunted residence in order to help the landlord recover the deed. Guinaifen can hardly keep her excitement down.

submissions.target: Give the deed to the landlord
submissions.desc: After conversing with the heliobus, you realize that the man calling himself the "landlord" is not as simple as he looked. You should give the deed to him, but he also needs to answer some questions.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Make a new post on Ghostly Grove
submissions.desc: Regardless, the incident has been resolved. It is time to post on Ghostly Grove, as per usual.

submissions.target: Speak to Sushang and Guinaifen
submissions.desc: The ghost-hunting squad obtained the permission to investigate the haunted residence in order to help the landlord recover the deed. Speak with Guinaifen and Sushang on how you should go about investigating the haunted residence.

submissions.target: Investigate the odd billboard
submissions.desc: There will always be unexpected items appearing in haunted residences, such as billboards with their backs to the front. Perhaps the journey to penetrate into the depths of the haunted residence should start here.

submissions.target: Investigate the abnormally posted wanted poster
submissions.desc: Sure, Kafka's wanted poster is pretty, but it shouldn't be here. Its appearance in the haunted residence is definitely an anomaly. Investigate it to see what is going on.

submissions.target: Investigate the haunted residence's secrets and continue onward
submissions.desc: Many items removed from the haunted residence are stacked in the small courtyard. Look around, and you might find the clue for your next destination buried within.

submissions.target: Go through the locked gate and continue
submissions.desc: Many items removed from the haunted residence are stacked in the small courtyard. Look around, and you might find the clue for your next destination buried within.

submissions.target: Open the safe and take out the deed
submissions.desc: The deed the landlord spoke of should be inside this safe. Crack the password on the safe, and you will be able to find the deed and complete the mission.\nMaybe there is some information on the stone monument that works as clues for the password...

submissions.target: Speak with the heliobus
submissions.desc: Can safes keep heliobi locked within? You know that's not possible. That means this safe is no ordinary box but the owner's retribution to those who wish to pry into their secrets...\nAsk the heliobus and see what it knows.

submissions.target: Speak to Sushang and Guinaifen
submissions.desc: After conversing with the heliobus, you realize that the man calling himself the "landlord" is not as simple as he looked. You should give the deed to him, but he also needs to answer some questions.

submissions.target: Head to Exalting Sanctum and search for the poster named A-Yue
submissions.desc: A post on Ghostly Grove concerning phone calls from ghosts catches your group's attention. After Guinaifen sends a private message to the poster, you make contact with a woman named A-Yue, who claims she has been constantly harassed by calls from ghosts. You agree to meet her at Exalting Sanctum, where she will share all the information she has...

submissions.target: Head to Stargazer Navalia to make the appointment on behalf of A-Yue
submissions.desc: A-Yue tells you about the ghostly phone calls she receives in the middle of the night, and reveals that the other party has asked to meet her at a specific location in Stargazer Navalia. A-Yue going there on her own would be very risky, especially compared to your ghost-hunting squad composed of capable exorcists. You accept A-Yue's commission and decide to meet the other person on her behalf in Stargazer Navalia, aiming to uncover their true identity.

submissions.target: Venture deeper into Stargazer Navalia and look for the person you are meeting
submissions.desc: As you arrive at the agreed location, you find nobody there. Could this be a mere prank? Since you're here already, you decide to explore deeper into Stargazer Navalia in search of potential clues...

submissions.target: Talk to the peculiar Wraith Warden
submissions.desc: Thankfully, the ghost-hunting squad arrives in the nick of time and rescues Huohuo. Interestingly, the frenzied Wraith Warden has also changed her attitude. Perhaps you can attempt to reason with her? Since there are so many of you here and you all have tricks up your sleeves, you can always resort to force if negotiation fails...

submissions.target: Continue talking to the Wraith Warden to uncover the truth behind the ghostly call
submissions.desc: It turns out the Wraith Warden has her own hidden stories. Thankfully, she does not dare to stir up trouble. Under your watchful gaze, she slowly recounts the truth behind everything...

submissions.target: Head to Aurum Alley to fulfill the unfinished promise
submissions.desc: As you suspected, this anomaly is indeed connected to a heliobus who is willing to do anything to break free from its confinement. To seal the heliobus and fulfill the unfortunate woman's sorrowful desires, you decide to proceed to Aurum Alley.

submissions.target: Talk to A-Yue and witness everything
submissions.desc: You bring the heliobus to meet A-Yue. With you as the witness, the Wraith Warden's unfinished wishes are fulfilled...

submissions.target: Seal the heliobus inside the Suppression Tower
submissions.desc: After all is said and done, you escort the heliobus to the Suppression Tower and seal it. Perhaps A-Yue will sleep soundly from now onwards?

submissions.target: Ask Shouling in Fyxestroll Garden
submissions.desc: Apparently the Ten-Lords Commission has tools to subdue heliobi from the air. What might that be?\nHead to Fyxestroll Garden and ask the Ten-Lords Commission spiritfarers.

submissions.target: Try to capture heliobi using the cycrane
submissions.desc: A cycrane, a Lunaumbra Gourd, and a... courier package. That's sure a simple and brutal way to go about it...\nBut an invention is useful as long as it does its job. Try control it for a bit.

submissions.target: Head to the Divination Commission
submissions.desc: The capabilities of the exorcist cycrane has been verified. It's time to head to locations flooded with heliobi.

submissions.target: Capture the arrogant heliobus
submissions.desc: A heliobus dares to taunt you, even though you have the Lunaumbra Gourd? You've gotta show it what you're made of.

submissions.target: Capture the final heliobus
submissions.desc: The heliobi in the sky have been reduced to a paltry few. It's time to send them where they belong.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Captured ({MCV#8015162_1}/3) heliobi
submissions.desc: One heliobus, two heliobi... Capturing heliobi is a tedious job too.

submissions.target: Discuss with the ghost-hunting squad
submissions.desc: Guinaifen seems to have something she wants to discuss with the ghost-hunting squad...\nListen to her and find out what new incident has gone down.

submissions.target: Go to the Astral Express and speak with March 7th
submissions.desc: You guessed it right. The poster this time is March 7th. She noticed that her photos are always capturing things that shouldn't be there. Maybe there's actually something wrong with the Express, and it should be investigated.\nSpeak to March 7th first.

submissions.target: Investigate in the Astral Express
submissions.desc: You guessed it right. The poster this time is March 7th. She noticed that her photos were always capturing things that shouldn't be there. Maybe there's actually something wrong with the Express, and it should be investigated.\nCheck if any of the Express Crew members are possessed by heliobi.

submissions.target: Go to Scalegorge Waterscape and complete Arkeri's journey
submissions.desc: The innocent heliobus was drawn to adventure. Perhaps the rare sights found in Scalegorge Waterscape can satisfy their curiosity.\nJoin March 7th and Arkeri on a journey to the Scalegorge Waterscape.

submissions.target: Go to the location in March 7th's photo
submissions.desc: Your adventures in Scalegorge Waterscape have sparked great curiosity in Arkeri. Introduce them to the wonders of this place.

submissions.target: Take a group photo
submissions.desc: This time, please make sure to capture Arkeri in the photo instead of as a "ghostly figure."

submissions.target: Go to the Astral Express and decide upon Arkeri's fate
submissions.desc: Regardless, you've concluded Arkeri's journey, and their path must now be decided.\nOnce you're prepared, it's time to chat with March 7th.

submissions.target: Cast the heliobus into the suppression tower
submissions.desc: The only good heliobus is a captured heliobus. The only place they should go is the Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden.

submissions.target: Discuss with the ghost-hunting squad
submissions.desc: Guinaifen seems to have something she wants to discuss with the ghost-hunting squad...\nListen to her and find out what new incident has gone down.

submissions.target: Head to Starskiff Haven and talk with Guinaifen
submissions.desc: Guinaifen mentions she wants to record the "Fan Q&A" at somewhere with a good scenary.\nYou can review the fans' questions, then bring the list to find her in Starskiff Haven.

submissions.target: Discuss with the ghost-hunting squad
submissions.desc: Guinaifen seems to have something she wants to discuss with the ghost-hunting squad...\nListen to her and find out what new incident has gone down.

submissions.target: Head to Exalting Sanctum and wait for Guinaifen's directions
submissions.desc: Guinaifen isn't spilling all the beans and says she'll tell you the good stuff in Exalting Sanctum.\nHowever, you figured everything out just by looking at the fan numbers. Please don't spoil her small surprise before you meet her in Exalting Sanctum.

submissions.target: Head to Aurum Alley and wait for Guinaifen's directions
submissions.desc: Guinaifen has some popularity in Aurum Alley since she had done restaurant-visit videos there.\nThat place is special for her. Is it special for you as well? Head there first.

submissions.target: Head to Fyxestroll Garden and wait for Guinaifen's directions
submissions.desc: When Guinaifen visited the haunted Fyxestroll Garden, she ended up by chance to be charged with running Ghostly Grove. You know the rest.\nFyxestroll Garden is also a special place for her. Go with her according to her plans.

submissions.target: Take a photo with the ghost-hunting squad
submissions.desc: Guinaifen wishes to keep this significant moment.\nNo other words are needed. Go and take a photo of this moment.

submissions.target: Speak to Guinaifen
submissions.desc: It seems Guinaifen still has something to say to you.\nYou've edited plenty of LilGuiGuinevere posts and this will be no exception. Go and chat with Guinaifen.

mission.name: Ghost-Hunting Squad: Excess Is as Bad as Deficiency

submissions.target: Discuss with the ghost-hunting squad
submissions.desc: Guinaifen seems to have something she wants to discuss with the ghost-hunting squad...\nListen to her and find out what new incident has gone down.

submissions.target: Head to Cloudford and investigate
submissions.desc: Since the post points to Locker No. 13 in Cloudford, go investigate it.\nHowever, you keep feeling things aren't as simple.

submissions.target: Speak with the suspicious person
submissions.desc: Someone has been quietly following you ever since you arrived at Cloudford.\nLocker No. 13 is suspicious, but this person is even more so. Hurry and question them.

submissions.target: Head to Aurum Alley and investigate
submissions.desc: Since the post points to a mysterious pawnshop in Aurum Alley, go investigate it.\nHowever, you keep feeling things aren't as simple.\nIsn't it the same as before?

submissions.target: Speak with the suspicious person
submissions.desc: Someone has been quietly following you ever since you arrived at Aurum Alley.\nThe mysterious pawnshop is suspicious, but this person is even more so. Hurry and question them.\nYou are experienced enough to know these things shouldn't keep happening.

submissions.target: Head to Fyxestroll Garden
submissions.desc: After telling off the fans, even the big-name streamer Guinaifen know what is right or wrong.\nGo back to Fyxestroll Garden first and keep doing what you should be doing.

submissions.target: Speak with the cycrane and sign the package
submissions.desc: A present mailed by a fan? That's surprising.\nLooks like Guinaifen didn't do anything wrong. Go accept the fan's gift. That's something you deserve.

submissions.target: Speak to Guinaifen
submissions.desc: The fanatical fan used fake information to trick Guinaifen to investigate on-site many times, just so they can meet her...\nSeriously, just let Guinaifen know if you want to meet her. With her personality, there's no need to jump through so many hoops.\nListen to what Guinaifen has to say.

submissions.target: Meet up with Guinaifen in Fyxestroll Garden
submissions.desc: The harrowing adventure in Fyxestroll Garden is an experience you hesitate to recount, but you simply cannot escape the mischievous hand of fate. Your next adventure begins with your blind faith in Little Gui's message, just as it did before.

submissions.target: Talk to Huohuo and learn about the task commissioned by the Ten-Lords Commission
submissions.desc: When you arrive at Fyxestroll Garden, a ghost-hunting squad is already assembled — organized under the grace of the Ten-Lords Commission, no less. Guinaifen intends to find information about escaped heliobi using the most prominent website on supernatural phenomena on the Xianzhou Luofu. Could this be the beginning of yet another tumultuous adventure?

submissions.target: Meet up with your teammates in Fyxestroll Garden
submissions.desc: Once again, you reunite with your fellow ghost hunters at Fyxestroll Garden. Scanning through the posts on Ghostly Grove and conducting investigations have become routine tasks for you.

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and check the post asking for help
submissions.desc: Having completed your adventure, you reunite with your fellow ghost hunters at Fyxestroll Garden. Scanning through the posts on Ghostly Grove and conducting investigations have become routine tasks for you.

submissions.target: Meet up with your teammates in Fyxestroll Garden
submissions.desc: Once again, you reunite with your fellow ghost hunters at Fyxestroll Garden. Scanning through the posts on Ghostly Grove and conducting investigations have become routine tasks for you.

submissions.target: Talk to Huohuo and check the post asking for help
submissions.desc: Having completed your adventure, you reunite with your fellow ghost hunters at Fyxestroll Garden. Scanning through the posts on Ghostly Grove and conducting investigations have become routine tasks for you.

submissions.target: Meet up with your teammates in Fyxestroll Garden
submissions.desc: Once again, you reunite with your fellow ghost hunters at Fyxestroll Garden. Scanning through the posts on Ghostly Grove and conducting investigations have become routine tasks for you.

submissions.target: Talk to Guinaifen and check the post asking for help
submissions.desc: Having completed your adventure, you and your fellow ghost hunters are expected to reunite at Fyxestroll Garden as always, just like checking into work... However, Huohuo is missing this time!\nGuinaifen has posted a message seeking information about Huohuo's whereabouts. Talk to her and see if she has discovered anything.

submissions.target: Raise the number of your subscribers to 20,000
submissions.desc: Ghostly Grove, once a modest gathering website for supernatural enthusiasts, has now become a thriving community where denizens of the Luofu Xianzhou exchange tales and rumors.\nTry to expand your sphere of influence, as this not only helps you get the information you need, but also allows you to operate openly in the name of the respected ghost-hunting squad.

submissions.target: Raise the number of your subscribers to 100,000
submissions.desc: Ghostly Grove, once a modest gathering website for supernatural enthusiasts, has now become a thriving community where denizens of the Luofu Xianzhou exchange tales and rumors.\nTry to expand your sphere of influence, as this not only helps you get the information you need, but also allows you to operate openly in the name of the respected ghost-hunting squad.

submissions.target: Raise the number of your subscribers to 400,000
submissions.desc: Ghostly Grove, once a modest gathering website for supernatural enthusiasts, has now become a thriving community where denizens of the Luofu Xianzhou exchange tales and rumors.\nTry to expand your sphere of influence, as this not only helps you get the information you need, but also allows you to operate openly in the name of the respected ghost-hunting squad.

submissions.target: Raise the number of your subscribers to 1,000,000
submissions.desc: Ghostly Grove, once a modest gathering website for supernatural enthusiasts, has now become a thriving community where denizens of the Luofu Xianzhou exchange tales and rumors.\nTry to expand your sphere of influence, as this not only helps you get the information you need, but also allows you to operate openly in the name of the respected ghost-hunting squad.

submissions.target: Head to the Fight Club and talk with Dr. Dig
submissions.desc: You receive Dr. Dig's message, which informs you that Boulder Town's Fight Club is now hosting a new tournament. In this adrenaline-pumping and thrilling "martial exhibition," the participants must use various martial arts to defeat opponents. In order to hone your battle skills — and even more so for the tantalizing rewards — you decide to participate too.

submissions.target: Talk to Herta
submissions.desc: Herta and others have added a new algorithmic branch to the Expansion Module. This time, they have simulated Nous and selected the time before the demise of #27 Emperor Rubert...

submissions.target: Enter the Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears.
submissions.desc: Herta and others have added a new Calculation branch named "Gold and Gears" to the Expansion Module. This time, Stephen Lloyd has created a "custom dice" for you, promising it to be even more interesting than any previous Audience Dice.

submissions.target: Complete Gold and Gears: Experimental Teaching
submissions.desc: Herta and others have added a new Calculation branch named "Gold and Gears" to the Expansion Module. This time, Stephen Lloyd has created a "custom dice" for you, promising it to be even more interesting than any previous Audience Dice.

submissions.target: Complete Gold and Gears: Experimental Teaching (II).
submissions.desc: Herta and others have added a new Calculation branch named "Gold and Gears" to the Expansion Module. This time, Stephen Lloyd has created a "custom dice" for you, promising it to be even more interesting than any previous Audience Dice.

submissions.target: Talk to Herta
submissions.desc: Herta and others have added a new Calculation branch named "Gold and Gears" to the Expansion Module. This time, Stephen Lloyd has created a "custom dice" for you, promising it to be even more interesting than any previous Audience Dice.

submissions.target: Enter the Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears.
submissions.desc: In this Simulated Universe update, Ruan Mei has nurtured a simulated Nous and set the time before the demise of #27 Emperor Rubert. However, something unusual has happened. IPC has reached out to Herta, showing their interest in the Simulated Universe project...

submissions.target: Collect 4 Secrets.
submissions.desc: In this Simulated Universe update, Ruan Mei has nurtured a simulated Nous and set the time before the demise of #27 Emperor Rubert. However, something unusual has happened. IPC has reached out to Herta, showing their interest in the Simulated Universe project...

submissions.target: Talk to Herta
submissions.desc: In this Simulated Universe update, Ruan Mei has nurtured a simulated Nous and set the time before the demise of #27 Emperor Rubert. However, something unusual has happened. IPC has reached out to Herta, showing their interest in the Simulated Universe project...

submissions.target: Talk to Herta
submissions.desc: It's all over. While you are still immersed in the shock brought by the data of Nous, Herta calls on you... She seems to have discovered something unusual — the little robot has developed "free will."

submissions.target: Complete Gold and Gears: Finale
submissions.desc: The Simulated Universe's storage was more limited than Herta expected! The data packs are at their limit and soon, the entire thing is going to stop working. Herta is prepared to see this thing through to the end by your side. Hurry and save all the previous Aeon data and ensure a proper end to this test before experiencing THEIR glory once more.

submissions.target: Complete Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears 1 time at any difficulty
submissions.desc: In this Simulated Universe update, Ruan Mei has nurtured a simulated Nous and set the time before the demise of #27 Emperor Rubert. However, something unusual has happened. IPC has reached out to Herta, showing their interest in the Simulated Universe project...

submissions.target: Report back to the Helper Robot about your nurturing results
submissions.desc: So... this kind of "mutation" can actually be generated by a recipe? Your nurturing results have confirmed it. Go report back to the Helper Robot immediately. This will definitely come in useful with the space station's special research into creations.

submissions.target: Go to the Seclusion Zone and talk to the Helper Robot.
submissions.desc: The genius' visit left behind mysterious creations from Ruan Mei on the space station. Asta has tasked you with nurturing these weird little lifeforms, and she's even prepared a Lifeform Oven and Helper Robot for you with Screwllum.\nHow exactly do you nurture creations? Let's ask the Helper Robot first.

submissions.target: Use the Lifeform Oven to conduct your first round of nurturing
submissions.desc: The genius' visit left behind mysterious creations from Ruan Mei on the space station. Asta has tasked you with nurturing these weird little lifeforms, and she's even prepared a Lifeform Oven and Helper Robot for you with Screwllum.\nHow exactly do you nurture creations? Let's ask the Helper Robot first.

submissions.target: Chat with your first creation
submissions.desc: Oh, with the Helper Robot's assistance, you manage to use the Lifeform Oven to nurture a new lifeform.\nWhat should this new creation call you? How are you going to take care of it? Suddenly, you begin to feel somewhat closer to the parenting experience...

submissions.target: Find the lost creation and monitor its condition
submissions.desc: The newly nurtured creation is a little shy and fearfully bolts out of your sight. The Helper Robot tells you it's not safe outside, so you should rush after it quickly.\nBut then again, this kind of sifting around through trash like this... Your knees and back are not going to thank you.

submissions.target: Take the confused creation back to the Helper Robot and chat with the robot
submissions.desc: You manage to successfully find the lost creation, and... you discover a mysterious mutation on it for which you have no explanation. Better head back and ask the Helper Robot about it.\nDoes eating trash makes them evolve? Something seems off just thinking about it...

submissions.target: Use the Lifeform Oven to nurture a rare creation
submissions.desc: "Mutation" is not common among creations. The Helper Robot asks you to keep nurturing it using the approach just outlined and see if you can crack the mystery behind Ruan Mei's creations.

submissions.target: Keep nurturing creations, and upgrade Research Level to 2
submissions.desc: There are still several special creations wandering around the space station. The researchers need enough samples to crack the secret behind their physical traits. The weight of this task now rests upon your shoulders...

submissions.target: Chat with the Helper Robot and ask what else it wants
submissions.desc: The Helper Robot is looking for you, apparently for something related to the creations — again. Quickly go and find out what's happened.

submissions.target: Accommodate all the creations inside the "Kitty Cot"
submissions.desc: Asta has bought a stack of sleeping supplies for the creations. The little ones need to rest too, so try moving them to a comfortable cot.\nYou knew without asking that all these things listed as "pet supplies" had to be paid for out of Asta's own pocket.

submissions.target: Investigate the cause of the noise nearby
submissions.desc: With your support, the creations quickly adapt to the environment of the Seclusion Zone — but some creations are still super noisy. What's happened? Go find out.\nIn a sense, they were nurtured into existence by you. Does that make you... their parent?

submissions.target: Keep nurturing creations, and upgrade Research Level to 4
submissions.desc: There's still not enough data on the creations. Keep nurturing them and work hard to improve the research progress. The weight of this task still rests upon your shoulders...

submissions.target: Seek advice from the Helper Robot
submissions.desc: The creations love this place, but too much excitement can be a bad thing. They made everything super messy in here. Let's get the Helper Robot to tidy up.\nYou seriously spoil them too much.

submissions.target: Spray the correct Rest Area symbol onto the floor
submissions.desc: Upon careful observation, you confirm that this is a good place to cordon off as the Rest Area. Time to spray the right graffiti on the ground to help these illiterate creations get back to their resting spots.

submissions.target: Report back to the Helper Robot.
submissions.desc: Splitting the place into functional areas was a great success. Time to go back and report to the Helper Robot with these results. The creations are really compliant now, and you trust that your nurturing work with the Helper Robot is going to be much easier from now on.

submissions.target: Spray the correct Dining Area symbol onto the floor
submissions.desc: Upon careful observation, you confirm that this is a good place to cordon off as the Dining Area. Time to spray the right graffiti on the ground to help these illiterate creations get back to their feeding spots.

submissions.target: Find a suitable place to plan out the Rest Area
submissions.desc: Just nurturing them without teaching them is no good. Time for the creations to learn the rules of the space station. The Helper Robot suggests using sprayed symbols to divide out functional areas, which would help them to better tidy up the place regularly.\nSpeaking of which, where would be best to put our Rest Area?

submissions.target: Find a suitable place to plan out the Dining Area
submissions.desc: Just nurturing them without teaching them is no good. Time for the creations to learn the rules of the space station. The Helper Robot suggests using sprayed symbols to divide out functional areas, which would help them to better tidy up the place regularly.\nSpeaking of which, where would be best to put our Dining Area?

submissions.target: Listen to how the creations feel about using the "Kitty Cot"
submissions.desc: Asta has bought a stack of sleeping supplies for the creations. The little ones need to rest too, so try moving them to a comfortable cot.\nYou knew without asking that all these things listed as "pet supplies" had to be paid for out of Asta's own pocket.

submissions.target: Take a group photo of you and your creations
submissions.desc: Wanting to see Ruan Mei. Wanting to convey their longing to her. Wanting her to remember them... These are the wishes of all her creations. Now's the time — while they're all clustered around you — to take the big group photo.

submissions.target: Send the group photo to Ruan Mei
submissions.desc: The group photo has been taken, and you prepare to send it off to Ruan Mei. Who knows what she'll think of it...

submissions.target: Go back to the Lifeform Oven and wait for the "surprise" to appear
submissions.desc: Asta tells you that there's a "surprise" waiting over for you at the Helper Robot. You decide to head over and see who — or what — is awaits you...

submissions.target: Keep nurturing creations and upgrade Research Level to 6.
submissions.desc: The creations that look very similar to Herta and Ruan Mei come to seek out your help. They hope you can keep on nurturing creations and speed up the research process to satisfy their curiosity.\nThe creations don't have to go to work like the researchers do, so you really have no idea why they want to perform research as well. Isn't it better to laze around?

submissions.target: (Optional) Use spray paint to touch up the background for the photo.
submissions.desc: If taking group photos is boring, you can use some of these rad graffiti patterns. Maybe it'll end up having the unexpected effect of stealing the limelight and bringing joy to everyone...

submissions.target: Chat with Wisteria Cake to learn what it needs
submissions.desc: Wisteria Cake still has other things that it wants to bother you with, a constant stream of never-ending demands that reminds you of its lookalike, Herta. Whatever, for the sake of these poor creations....\nDon't tell me this little one is going to try and build its own mini Simulated Universe.

submissions.target: Check out the newly designated Rest Area
submissions.desc: The resting area for Ruan Mei's creations has been built, and the little ones are giving you a thumbs up... if they can do that. Now it's time to check out the fruits of your labor!

submissions.target: Check out the newly designated Dining Area
submissions.desc: The eating area for Ruan Mei's creations has been built, and the little ones are giving you a thumbs up... if they can do that. Now it's time to check out the fruits of your labor!

submissions.target: Clear all stages in It All Started With a Man and a Dog
submissions.desc: Asta approaches you for help: Peppy is missing, and she's too busy, so she needs you to find Peppy. Fortunately, the nurturing work is going very well, so you happen to be free right now — go help out.\nHow exactly is Peppy's disappearance connected to the creations? The Helper Robot isn't very clear on this, either.

submissions.target: Talk with Arlan
submissions.desc: There seems to be trouble again in the space station. Arlan is asking for your help. But this time, the "culprit" looks really suspicious. Could such a cute little thing really do any harm? You are a little confused, but since Arlan asked politely, guess it's best to help out...

submissions.target: Talk with Cloudbot
submissions.desc: The Cloudbot is responsible for synchronizing the tester's thoughts to the cloud. You agree to participate in the Department of Ecology's special test.

submissions.target: Interact with cryosleep pod
submissions.desc: The Cloudbot guides you to lie down in the cryosleep pod. You are a little nervous, not knowing what you will face next... By the way, where is the eject button?

submissions.target: Achieve the designated points in all Normal Mode stages in Virtual Scentventure
submissions.desc: Is there anything that a stick can't solve? It's just a battle, but this "scent plug-in" is quite interesting...

submissions.target: Talk to Cloudbot and report your progress
submissions.desc: Very good, it was just an illusion. You completed the test smoothly. Now it's time to chat with the Cloudbot. I wonder if the threshold data recorded in this test is in line with the expectations of the Department of Ecology?

submissions.target: Interact with the cryosleep pod and challenge Despair Mode
submissions.desc: The cloud has automatically updated the Hard Mode. To clear the stage... you have to get the All-Clear achievement... Now this is the only thought lingering in your mind.

submissions.target: Go to the Exalting Sanctum and meet Mr. Xiyan's new pet
submissions.desc: Mr. Xiyan suddenly contacted you and said that he got a miraculous new pet, and that "you will definitely like it!"\nGo to Spare Time Book Shop and have a look. Maybe that pet will bring you an unexpected surprise.

submissions.target: Listen to Youci's exciting story
submissions.desc: Youci seems very eager to tell you a story. Go listen to it.
